GP12brndp1_u:2139: agniṣvāttā smṛtā nāmnā tathā barhiṣadaśca vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2144: ṛtavaḥ pitaro devāḥ śāstre 'sminniścayaṃ gatāḥ // BndP_1,13.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2145: madhumādhavau rasau jñeyau śuciśukrau ca śuṣmiṇau /
GP12brndp1_u:2150: kālāvasthāsu ṣaṭsvete māsākhyā vai vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,13.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:2157: eteṣu sthānino ye tu kālāvasthā vyavasthitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2160: nimeṣāśca kalāḥ kaṣṭhā muhurttā divasāḥ kṣayāḥ // BndP_1,13.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2164: ṛtavastu nimeḥ putrā vijñeyāste tathaiva ṣaṭ // BndP_1,13.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2170: sthāneṣu sthānino hyete sthānātmānaḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,13.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2172: prajāpatiḥ smṛto yastu sa tu saṃvatsaro mataḥ // BndP_1,13.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:2176: dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāṃ caiva pakṣiṇāṃ sarvatāmapi // BndP_1,13.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2177: sthāvarāṇāṃ ca pañcānāṃ puṣpaṃ kālārttavaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2178: ṛtutvamārtavatvaṃ ca pitṛtvaṃ ca prakīrttitam // BndP_1,13.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2181: tasmādete hi pitara ārtavā iti naḥ śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:2186: jajñe svadhāpitṛbhyastu dve kanye lokaviśrute // BndP_1,13.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2187: menā ca dhāraṇī caiva yābhyāṃ dhatamidaṃ jagat /
GP12brndp1_u:2188: te ubhe brahmavādinyau yoginyau caiva te ubhe // BndP_1,13.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2189: pitaraste nije kanye dharmārthaṃ pradaduḥ śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2190: agniṣvāttāstu ye proktāsteṣāṃ menā tu mānasī // BndP_1,13.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2191: dhāraṇī mānasī caiva kanyā barhiṣadāṃ smṛtā /
GP12brndp1_u:2192: merostāṃ dhāraṇīṃ nāma patnyarthaṃ vā sṛjan ghubhām // BndP_1,13.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:2194: agniṣvāttāstu tāṃ menā patnī himavate daduḥ // BndP_1,13.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2196: menā himavataḥ patnī mainākaṃ sā vyajāyata // BndP_1,13.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:2197: gaṅgāṃ saridvarāṃ caiva patnī yā lavaṇodadheḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2198: mainākasyā tmajaḥ kraucaḥ kraiñcadvīpo yataḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,13.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2200: mandaraṃ suṣuve putraṃ tisraḥ kanyāśca viśrutāḥ // BndP_1,13.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2201: velāṃ ca niyatiṃ caiva tṛtīyāṃ cāyatiṃ viduḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2203: svāyaṃ bhuveṃ'tare pūrvaṃ yayorvai kīrttitāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2206: savarṇāyāṃ sutā jātā daśa prācīnabarhiṣaḥ // BndP_1,13.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2208: teṣāṃ svāyaṃbhuvo dakṣaḥ putratvaṃ jagmi vānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,13.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:2211: utpannaḥ sa kathaṃ dakṣo hyabhiśāpādbhavasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:2212: cākṣuṣasyāntare pūrvaṃ tannaḥ prabrūhi pṛcchatām // BndP_1,13.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:2215: sūta uvāca dakṣasyāsansutā hyaṣṭau kanyā yāḥ kīrttitā mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:2216: svebhyo gṛhebhya ānāyya tāḥ pitābhyarcayadgṛhe // BndP_1,13.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:2218: tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhā satī nāma patnī yā tryaṃbakasya vai // BndP_1,13.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:2222: tato jñātvā satī sarvāḥ nyavasaṃstāḥ piturgṛhe // BndP_1,13.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:2224: tābhyo hīnāṃ pitā cakre satyāḥ pūjāmasaṃmatām // BndP_1,13.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:2226: yavīyasībhyo pyadhamāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā mama prabho // BndP_1,13.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2228: ahaṃ jyeṣṭhā variṣṭhā ca tvaṃ māṃ satkartumarha si // BndP_1,13.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:2230: tvattaḥ śreṣṭhāvariṣṭhāśca pūjyā bālāḥ sutā mama // BndP_1,13.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:2231: tāsāṃ caiva tu bhartāra ste me bahumātāḥ sati /
GP12brndp1_u:2234: vasiṣṭho 'triḥ pulastyaśca hyaṅgirā pulahaḥ kratuḥ // BndP_1,13.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2236: yasmānmāṃ sparddhate śarvaḥ sadā caivāvamanyate // BndP_1,13.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:2237: tena tvāṃ na vibhūṣomi pratikūlo hi me bhavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2240: tathoktā pitaraṃ sā vai kruddhā devīdama bravīt // BndP_1,13.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2254: dakṣasya ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca cukopa bhagavānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,13.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:2257: asyāṃ kṣitau dhṛtā lokāḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti bhāsvarāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2258: tānahaṃ dhārayā mīha satataṃ ca tadājñayā // BndP_1,13.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:2259: cāturvarṇyaṃ hi devānāṃ te cāpyekatra bhuñjate /
GP12brndp1_u:2260: nāhaṃ taiḥ saha bhokṣaye vai tato dāsyanti te pṛthak // BndP_1,13.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2262: praśastāścetarāḥ sarvāḥ svasutā bhartṛbhiḥ saha // BndP_1,13.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2264: utpatsyante dvitīye vai mama yajña hyayonicāḥ // BndP_1,13.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2265: hute vai brahmaṇā śukre cākṣuṣasyātare manoḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2268: prācīnabarhiṣaḥ pautraḥ putraścaiva prace tasām // BndP_1,13.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:2269: dakṣa eveha nāmnā tu māriṣāyāṃ janiṣyasi /
GP12brndp1_u:2270: kanyāyāṃ śākhināṃ tvaṃ vai prāpte vaivasvateṃ'tare // BndP_1,13.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:2272: dharmmayukte ca te kārye ekasmiṃstu durāsade // BndP_1,13.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:2273: suta uvāca tadupaśrutya dakṣastu rudraṃ so 'bhya śapatpunaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2275: tasmātsārddhaṃ surairyajñe na tvāṃ yakṣyanti vai dvijāḥ // BndP_1,13.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2276: hutvā'hutiṃ tava krūra hyapaḥ sprakṣyanti karmasu /
GP12brndp1_u:2277: ihaiva vatsyasi tathā divaṃ hitvā yugakṣayāt // BndP_1,13.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:2278: tato devaiḥsa taiḥ sārddhaṃ nejyate pṛthasijyate /
GP12brndp1_u:2280: svāyaṃbhuvīṃ tanuṃ tyaktvā utpanno mānuṣeṣviha // BndP_1,13.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:2283: atha devī satī yā tu prāpte vaivasvateṃ'tare /
GP12brndp1_u:2284: menāyāṃ tāmumāṃ devīṃ janayāmāsa śailarāṭ // BndP_1,13.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:2286: sadā patnī bhavasyaiṣā na tayā mucyate bhavaḥ // BndP_1,13.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:2288: yathā nārāyaṇaṃ śrīśca maghavataṃ śacī yathā // BndP_1,13.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:2289: viṣṇuṃ kīrtī ruṣā mūryaṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ cāpyarundhatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2290: naitāstu vijahatyetān bhartṝn devyaḥ kadācana // BndP_1,13.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:2291: āvartamānāḥ kalpeṣu jāyante taiḥ punaḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:2292: evaṃ prācetaso dakṣo jajñe vai cākṣuṣeṃ'tare // BndP_1,13.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:2294: jajñe tadābhiśāpena dvitīya iti naḥ śrutam // BndP_1,13.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:2295: bhṛgavādayaśca ye sapta jajñire ca maharṣayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2296: ādye tretāyuge pūrvaṃ manorvaivasvatasya ca // BndP_1,13.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:2302: khyātiṃ na muñcate jantustanna kāryaṃ vipaścitā // BndP_1,13.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:2304: yā dakṣamadhikṛtyeha tvayā pūrvaṃ pracauditā // BndP_1,13.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:2308: devāyāmā iti khyātāḥ pūrvaṃ ye yajñasūnavaḥ // BndP_1,13.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:2310: putrāḥ svāyaṃbhuvasyaite śaktā nāma tu mānasāḥ // BndP_1,13.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:2311: teṣāṃ yato gaṇā hyete devānāṃ tu trayaḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2318: turīya idrayukcaiva yukto grāvajitastu vai // BndP_1,13.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:2320: jaro vibhurvibhāvaśca sa ṛcīko 'tha durdihaḥ // BndP_1,13.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:2332: atīto vartamānena dṛṣṭo vaivasvate na saḥ // BndP_1,13.101 //
GP12brndp1_u:2335: bhṛgvaṃ girā marīciśca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2338: jyotiṣmān dyutimānhavyaḥ savanaḥ sattra eva ca // BndP_1,13.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:2344: bahutvānnāmadheyānāṃ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ kutaḥ kule // BndP_1,13.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:2347: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ ka eṣa bhagavān kālaḥ sarvabhūtāpahārakaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2348: kasya yoniḥ kimādiśca kiṃ satattvaḥ kimātmakaḥ // BndP_1,13.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:2349: kimasya cakṣuḥ kā mūrtiḥ ke vā avayavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2350: kiṃ nāmadheyaṃ ko 'syātmā eptattvaṃ brūhi tattvataḥ // BndP_1,13.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:2351: sūta uvāca śrūyatā kālasadbhāvaḥ śrutvā caivāvadhāryatām /
GP12brndp1_u:2354: saṃvatsaraḥ satattvaśca nāma cāsya kalātmakaḥ // BndP_1,13.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:2356: pañcadhā pravibhaktāṃ tu kālāvasthāṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,13.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:2362: kraturagnistu yaḥ proktaḥ sa tu saṃvatsaro mataḥ // BndP_1,13.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:2365: sa iḍāvatsaraḥ somaḥ purāṇe niścayaṃ gataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2369: sa rudro vatsara steṣāṃ vijñeyo nīlalohitaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2370: satattvaṃ tasya vakṣyami kīrtyamānaṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,13.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:2377: yoniḥ sa pravibhāgānāṃ divasānāṃ ca bhāskaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2411: devatvaṃ ca pitṛtvaṃ ca kālatvaṃ cāsya yatparam /
GP12brndp1_u:2413: yataḥ patiḥ sa bhagavān prajeśānāṃ prajāpatiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2419: gāyatrī caiva triṣṭupca jagatī caiva yāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2420: tryaṃbakā nāmataḥ premṇā yonayastā vanaspateḥ // BndP_1,13.145 //
GP12brndp1_u:2422: trisādhanaḥ puroḍāśastrikapālaḥ sa vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,13.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:2424: ityetatpañcavarṣaṃ hi yugaṃ proktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ // BndP_1,13.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:2425: yaścaiṣa pañcadhātmā vai proktaḥ saṃvatsaro dvijaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2428: ityeṣa bahumāno vai prāṇinā jīvitāni ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2429: nadīvega ivāsaktaḥ kālo dhāvati saṃharan // BndP_1,13.149 //
GP12brndp1_u:2434: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:2441: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca kīrtya mānaṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,14.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:2443: yairiyaṃ pṛthivī sarvā saptadvīpā sapattanā // BndP_1,14.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2449: kanyā sā tu mahābhāga kardamasya prajā pateḥ // BndP_1,14.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2450: kanye dve daśa putrāśca samrāṭ kukṣiśca te śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2451: tayorvai bhrātaraḥ śūrāḥ prajāpatisamā daśa // BndP_1,14.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2453: jyotiṣmān dyutimānhavyaḥ savanaḥ sabhra eva ca // BndP_1,14.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:2455: dvīpeṣu teṣu dharmeṇa dvīpāntāśca nibodhata // BndP_1,14.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2461: śākadvīpeśvaraṃ cāpi havyaṃ cakre priyavrataḥ // BndP_1,14.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:2465: mahāvītaṃ smṛtaṃ varṣaṃ tasya nāmnā mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,14.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:2468: jaladaṃ ca kumāraṃ ca sukumāraṃ maṇīvakam /
GP12brndp1_u:2471: kumārasya tu kaumāraṃ dvitīyaṃ parikīrtitam // BndP_1,14.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2475: modakasyāpi modākaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prakīrttitam // BndP_1,14.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:2477: teṣāṃ tu nāmabhistāni sapta varṣāṇi tatra vai // BndP_1,14.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2482: kuśalasya tu deśo 'bhūta kauśalo nāma viśrutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2483: deśo manonugasyāpi mānonuge ite smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,14.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2487: ete janapadāḥ sapta kraiñcadvīpe tu bhāsvarāḥ // BndP_1,14.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2489: udbhijjo veṇumāṃścaiva vairatho lavaṇo dhṛtiḥ // BndP_1,14.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2490: ṣaṣṭhaḥ prabhākaraścā pi saptamaḥ kapilaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2491: udbhijjaṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ veṇumaṇḍalam // BndP_1,14.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:2492: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ lavaṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2493: pañcamaṃ dhṛtimadvarṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram // BndP_1,14.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2495: teṣāṃ deśāḥ kaśadvīpe tatsanāmāna eva ca // BndP_1,14.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2497: śālmalasyeśvarāḥ sapta sutāste ca vapuṣmataḥ // BndP_1,14.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2505: sapta medhātithe putrāḥ plakṣadvīpeśvarā nṛpāḥ // BndP_1,14.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2506: jyeṣṭhaḥ śāntabhayo nāma dvitīyaḥ śiśiraḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2509: dhruvastu saptamo jñeyaḥ putrā medhātitheḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,14.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2510: saptānāṃ nāmabhisteṣāṃ tāni varṣāṇi sapta vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2511: tasmācchāntabhayaṃ caiva śiśiraṃ ca sukhodayam // BndP_1,14.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:2512: ānandaṃ ca śivaṃ caiva kṣemakaṃ ca dhruvaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:2513: tāni teṣāṃ samānāni sapta varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2519: sukhamāyuśca rūpaṃ ca balaṃ dharmaśca nityaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:2527: ramyastu pañcamaḥ putro hiraṇvān ṣaṣṭha ucyate // BndP_1,14.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:2530: nābhestu dakṣiṇaṃ varṣaṃ himākhyaṃ tu pitā dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2531: hemakūṭaṃ tu yadvarṣaṃ dadau kipuruṣāya tat // BndP_1,14.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:2532: naiṣadhaṃ yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣāya taṃ dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2533: madhyamaṃ yatsumerostu dadau sa tadilāvṛtam // BndP_1,14.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2534: nīlaṃ tu yatsmṛtaṃ varṣaṃ ramyāyaitaptitā dadau /
GP12brndp1_u:2535: śvetaṃ yaduttaraṃ tasmātpitrā dattaṃ hiraṇvate // BndP_1,14.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:2537: sālyavantaṃ tathā varṣaṃ bhadrāśvāya nyavedayat // BndP_1,14.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:2539: ityetāni mayoktāni nava varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:2541: yathākramaṃ sa dharmātmā tatastu tapasi sthitaḥ // BndP_1,14.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2542: ityetauḥ saptabhiḥ kṛtsnā saptadvīpā nive śitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2543: priyavratasya putraistaiḥ pautaiḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya ca // BndP_1,14.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:2544: evaṃ varṣeṣu sarveṣu sanniveśāḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2545: kriyante pralaye vṛtte sapta saptasu pārthivaiḥ // BndP_1,14.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:2546: evaṃ svabhāvaḥ kalpānāṃ dvīpānāṃ ca niveśane /
GP12brndp1_u:2547: yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni varṇāṇyaṣṭau śrutāni tu // BndP_1,14.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2549: viparyayo na teṣvasti jarāmṛtyubhayaṃ na ca // BndP_1,14.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:2551: na teṣvasti yugāvasthā kṣetreṣvaṣṭāsu sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,14.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:2557: himāhvaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ varṣaṃ bharatāya nyavedayat // BndP_1,14.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2558: tasmāttu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tasya nāmnā vidurbudhāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2561: putrasaṃkrāmitaśrīstu vanaṃ rājā viveśa saḥ // BndP_1,14.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:2565: pratīhāraḥ kulaṃ tasya nāmnā jajñe tadanvayaḥ // BndP_1,14.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2567: unnetā pratihartustu bhūmā tasya sutaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,14.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2569: prastāvestu vibhuḥ putraḥ pṛthustasya suto 'bhavat // BndP_1,14.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2570: pṛthoścāpi suto nakto naktasyāpi gayaḥ sutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2571: gayasyāpi naraḥ putro narasyāpi suto virāṭ // BndP_1,14.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:2576: tasya putraśataṃ tvāsīdrājānaḥ sarva eva tu /
GP12brndp1_u:2579: teṣāṃ vaṃśaprasūtaistu bhukteyaṃ bhāratī purā // BndP_1,14.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2583: evaṃ svāyaṃ bhuvaḥ sargo yenedaṃ pūritaṃ jagat // BndP_1,14.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:2586: teṣāṃ sṛṣṭiriyaṃ proktā yugaiḥ saha vivarttate // BndP_1,14.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:2587: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:2589: sūta uvāca evaṃ prajāsanniveśaṃ śrutvā vai śāṃśapāyaniḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2590: papraccha niyataṃ sūtaṃ pṛthivyuda dhivistaram // BndP_1,15.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2591: kati dvīpā samudrā vā pavatā vā kati smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2592: kiyanti caiva varṣāṇi teṣu nadyaśca kāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,15.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:2593: mahā bhūtapramāṇaṃ ca lokālokaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2595: etatprabūhi naḥ sarvaṃ vistareṇa yathārthataḥ // BndP_1,15.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:2596: sūta uvāca hanta vo 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi pṛthivyāyāmavistaram // BndP_1,15.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2597: saṃkhyāṃ caiva samudrāṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ caiva vistaram /
GP12brndp1_u:2599: na śakyante krameṇeha vaktuṃ yaiḥ satataṃ jagat /
GP12brndp1_u:2602: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa sādhayet // BndP_1,15.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2614: jaṃbūdvīpasya vistārāt samena tu samantataḥ // BndP_1,15.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:2618: sarvarttuṣu sukhaścāpi niṣadhaḥ parvato mahān // BndP_1,15.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:2620: dvātriṃśacca sahasrāṇi vistīrṇaḥ sa ca mūrddhani // BndP_1,15.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2624: pūrvatarḥ śvetavarṇaśca brāhmaṇastasya tena tat // BndP_1,15.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:2630: vṛttaḥ svabhāvataḥ prokto varṇataḥ parimāṇataḥ // BndP_1,15.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:2636: navaivaṃ tu sahasrāṇi vistīrṇaṃ sarvatastu tat // BndP_1,15.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2639: varṣāṇi yāni ṣaṭ caiva teṣāṃ ye varṣaparvatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2640: dve dve sahasre vistīrṇā yojanānāṃ samucchrayāt // BndP_1,15.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2642: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi śataṃ dvāvāyatau girī // BndP_1,15.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2643: nīlaśca niṣadhaścaiva tābhyāṃ hīnāstu ye pare /
GP12brndp1_u:2645: navatī dve aśītī dve sahasrāṇyāyatāstu teḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2646: teṣāṃ madhye janapadāstāni varṇāṇi sapta vai // BndP_1,15.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2650: idaṃ haimavataṃ varṣaṃ bhārataṃ nāma viśrutam // BndP_1,15.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2651: hemakūṭaṃ paraṃ hyasmā nnānnā kiṃṣurupaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2654: ilāvṛtātpiraṃ nīlaṃ samyakaṃ nāma viśrutam // BndP_1,15.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2656: hiraṇmayātparaṃ caiva śṛṅgavattaḥ kuru smṛtam // BndP_1,15.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:2657: dhanuḥsaṃsthe tu vijñeye dve varṣe dakṣiṇottare /
GP12brndp1_u:2658: dīrghāṇi tatra catvāri madhyamaṃ tadilāvṛtam // BndP_1,15.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2659: arvāk ca niṣadhasyātha vedyarddhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2660: paraṃ nīlavato yacca vedyarddhaṃ tu taduttaram // BndP_1,15.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2661: vedyarddhe dakṣiṇe trīṇi trīṇi varṣāṇi cottare /
GP12brndp1_u:2662: tayormadhye tu vijñeyo merurmadhya ilāvṛtam // BndP_1,15.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2670: caturvaṇaḥ sa sauvarṇaḥ caturasraḥ samucchritaḥ // BndP_1,15.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:2686: sa tu meruḥ parivṛto bhuvanairbhūtabhāvanaiḥ // BndP_1,15.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:2694: tatra te śubhakarmāṇaḥ ketumālāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // BndP_1,15.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2695: tatra kālā narāḥ sarve mahāsattvā mahābalāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2698: īśvaro brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ kāmacārī manojavaḥ // BndP_1,15.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:2699: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ jīvanti ca samāyutam /
GP12brndp1_u:2700: pārśve mālyavataścāpi pūrve 'pūrvā tu gaṇḍikā // BndP_1,15.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:2704: tatra te puruṣāḥ svetā mahotsāhā balānvitāḥ // BndP_1,15.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:2709: kālāmrasya rasaṃ pītvā sarve ca sthirayauvanāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2710: dakṣiṇena tu śvetasya nīlasyaivottareṇa ca // BndP_1,15.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2711: varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante tatra mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2714: tatrāpi sumahānvṛkṣo nyagrodho rohito mahān // BndP_1,15.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:2715: tasyāpi te phalarasaṃ pibanto varttayanti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:2716: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca // BndP_1,15.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:2717: jīvanti te mahābhāgāḥ sadā tdṛṣṭā narottamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2718: dakṣiṇe vai śṛṅgavataḥ śvetasyāpyuttareṇa ca // BndP_1,15.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:2719: varṣaṃ hairaṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī /
GP12brndp1_u:2720: mahābalāḥ sutejaskā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ // BndP_1,15.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:2723: āyuḥ pramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2725: tasya pītvā phalarasaṃ te jīvanti nirāmayāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2726: trīṇi śṛṅgavataḥ śṛṅgāṇyucchritāni mahānti ca // BndP_1,15.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:2729: uttare vai śṛṅgāvataḥ samudrasya ca dakṣiṇe /
GP12brndp1_u:2732: vastrāṇi ca prasūyante phaleṣvābharaṇāni ca // BndP_1,15.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:2736: ye kṣaranti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ hyamṛtopamam // BndP_1,15.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:2742: teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanti hyamṛto pamam // BndP_1,15.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:2743: mithunaṃ jāyate sadyaḥ samaṃ caiva vivarddhate /
GP12brndp1_u:2744: samaṃ śīlaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca priyatā caiva tatsamā // BndP_1,15.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:2748: jīvanti te mahāvīryā na cānyastrīniṣeviṇaḥ // BndP_1,15.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:2749: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvītīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:2751: sūta uvāca evameva nisargo vai varṣāṇāṃ bhārate śubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:2752: dṛṣṭaḥ paramatattvajñairbhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmi vaḥ // BndP_1,16.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2757: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi varṣe 'smin bhārate prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2758: idaṃ tu madhyamaṃ citraṃ śubhāśubhaphalodayam // BndP_1,16.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:2760: varṣaṃ tadbhārataṃ nāma yatreyaṃ bhāratī prajā // BndP_1,16.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2764: na khalvanyatra martyānāṃ bhūmau karma vidhīyate // BndP_1,16.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2770: yojanānāṃ sahasre tu dvīpo 'yaṃ dakṣiṇottarāt // BndP_1,16.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2774: pūrve kirātā hyasyānte paścime yavanāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:2775: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā madhye śūdrāśca bhāgaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2782: kṛtsnaṃ jayati yo hyenaṃ samrāḍityabhidhīyate // BndP_1,16.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:2783: ayaṃ lokastu vai samrāḍantarikṣaṃ virāṭ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:2784: svarāḍasau smṛto laukaḥ punarvakṣyāmi vistarāt // BndP_1,16.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:2788: teṣāṃ sahasraścānye parva tāstu samīpagāḥ // BndP_1,16.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:2796: anye tebhyo 'parijñātā hrasvāḥ svalapopajī vinaḥ // BndP_1,16.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:2798: pīyante yairimā nadyo gaṅgā siṃdhu sarasvatī // BndP_1,16.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2800: irāvatī vitastā ca vipāśā devikā kuhūḥ // BndP_1,16.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2801: gomatī dhūtapāpā ca budbudā ca dṛṣadvatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2802: kauśakī tridivā caiva niṣṭhīvī geḍakī tathā // BndP_1,16.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:2804: vedasmṛtirvedavatī vṛtraghnī siṃdhu reva ca // BndP_1,16.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2807: kṣiprā hyavanti ca tathā pāriyātrāśrayāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2808: śoṇo mahānadaścaiva narmmadā surasā kriyā // BndP_1,16.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2809: mandākinī daśārṇā ca citrakūṭā tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2810: tamasā pippalā śyenā karamodā piśācikā // BndP_1,16.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2812: sanerujā śuktimatī maṅkutī tridivā kratuḥ // BndP_1,16.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2814: tāpī payoṣṇī nirvindhyā sṛpā ca niṣadhā nadī // BndP_1,16.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:2815: veṇī vaitaraṇī caiva kṣiprā vālā kumudvatī /
GP12brndp1_u:2816: toyā caiva mahāgaurī durgā vānnaśilā tathā // BndP_1,16.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2826: kṛpā palāśinī caiva śuktimatprabhavāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:2827: tāstu nadyaḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarvā gaṅgāḥ samudragāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2828: viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvā jagatpāpaharāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,16.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:2832: matsyāḥ kuśalyāḥ sauśalyāḥ kuntalāḥ kāśikośalāḥ // BndP_1,16.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:2836: pṛthivyāmapi kṛtsnāyāṃ sa pradeśo manoramaḥ // BndP_1,16.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:2837: tatra govardhanaṃ nāma puraṃ rāmeṇa nirmitam /
GP12brndp1_u:2838: rāmapriyātha svargīyā vṛkṣa divyāsta thauṣadhīḥ // BndP_1,16.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:2856: tataḥ plavaṅgavo jñeyā maladā malavartikāḥ // BndP_1,16.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:2872: nāsikāścaiva ye cānye ye caivāntaranarmadāḥ // BndP_1,16.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:2884: apaprāva raṇāścaiva ūrṇā darvāḥ sahūhukāḥ // BndP_1,16.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:2886: catvāri bhārate varṣe yugāni ṛṣayo 'bruvan // BndP_1,16.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:2887: kṛtaṃ tretāyugaṃ caiva dvāparaṃ tiṣyameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2891: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ yacca kiṃpuruṣaṃ varṣaṃ harivarṣaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:2892: ācakṣva no yathātattvaṃ kīrttitaṃ bhārataṃ tvayā // BndP_1,17.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:2893: sūta uvāca śuśrūṣā yatra vo viprāstacchṛṇudhvamatandritāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2899: varṣe kiṃpuruṣe puṇye vṛkṣo madhuvahaḥ śubhaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2900: tasya kiṃpuruṣāḥ sarve 'piban hi rasamuttamam // BndP_1,17.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2904: harivarṣe narāḥ sarve pibantīkṣurasaṃ śupham // BndP_1,17.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2906: harivarṣe tu jīvanti sarve muditamānasāḥ // BndP_1,17.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2907: na jarā bādhate tatra na mriyante ca te 'cirāt /
GP12brndp1_u:2908: madhyamaṃ yanmayā proktaṃ nāmnā varṣamilāvṛtam // BndP_1,17.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:2909: na tatra sūryastapati na tu jīryanti mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2910: candrasūryai sanakṣatrau na prakāśāvilā vṛte // BndP_1,17.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2917: āyuḥ pramāṇaṃ jīvanti ye tu varṣa ilāvṛte /
GP12brndp1_u:2928: teṣāṃ madhye mahāmeruḥ svaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // BndP_1,17.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:2938: tasya nāmnā samā khyāto jambūdvīpo vanaspateḥ // BndP_1,17.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:2940: utsedho vṛkṣarājasya divaṃ spṛśati sarvataḥ // BndP_1,17.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:2944: tasyā jambvāḥ phalaraso nadī bhūtvā prasarppati // BndP_1,17.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:2946: taṃ pibanti sadā tdṛṣṭā jaṃbūrasamilāvṛte // BndP_1,17.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:2947: jaṃbūphalarase pīte na jarā bādhate tu tān /
GP12brndp1_u:2948: na kṣudhā na śramaścāpi na mṛtyurna ca tandri tam // BndP_1,17.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:2950: indragopakasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate bhāsvaraṃ tu tat // BndP_1,17.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:2952: skannaṃ bhavati tacchubhraṃ kanakaṃ devabhūṣaṇam // BndP_1,17.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:2953: teṣāṃ mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ ca dikṣu sarvāsu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2956: hemakūṭe tu gandharvā vijñeyāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // BndP_1,17.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:2960: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ car śvetaḥ parvata ucyate // BndP_1,17.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:2962: navasveteṣu varṣeṣu yathābhāgaṃ sthiteṣu vai // BndP_1,17.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:2965: na saṃkhyā parisaṃkhyātuṃ śraddheyā tu bubhūṣatām // BndP_1,17.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:2966: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:2968: sūta uvāca madhye himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe kailāso nāma parvataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2977: candraprabho nāma giriḥ suśubhro ratnasannibhaḥ // BndP_1,18.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:2978: tasya pāde mahāddivyaṃ svacchodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2981: tasmin girau nivasati maṇibhadraḥ sahānugaḥ // BndP_1,18.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:2983: puṇyā mandākinī caiva nadī svacchodakā ca yā // BndP_1,18.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:2986: manaḥ śilāmayaṃ divyaṃ citrāṅgaṃ parvataṃ prati /
GP12brndp1_u:2987: lohito hemaśṛṅgaśca giriḥ sūryaprabho mahān // BndP_1,18.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:2988: tasya pāde mahaddivyaṃ lohitaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:2989: tasmātpuṇyaḥ prabhavati lauhityaḥ sa nado mahān // BndP_1,18.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:2990: devāraṇyaṃ viśokaṃ ca tasya tīre mahadvanam /
GP12brndp1_u:2991: tasmingirau nivasati yakṣo maṇidharo vaśī // BndP_1,18.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:2996: tasya pāde kalaḥ puṇyaṃ mānasaṃ siddhasevitam /
GP12brndp1_u:2998: tasyāstīre vana divyaṃ vaibhrājaṃ nāma viśrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:3007: muñjavāstu mahādivyo durgaḥ śailo himācitaḥ // BndP_1,18.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3009: tasyā pādātprabhavati śailodaṃ nāma tatsaraḥ // BndP_1,18.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3011: sā cakṣuḥ sītayormadhye praviṣṭā lavaṇodadhim // BndP_1,18.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:3012: tasyāstīre vanaṃ divyaṃ viśrutaṃ surabhīti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:3015: hiraṇyaśṛṅgaḥ sumahān divyo maṇimayo giriḥ // BndP_1,18.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:3017: ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ // BndP_1,18.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:3019: divaṃ yāsyanti te burve gaṅgatoyapariplutāḥ // BndP_1,18.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:3021: tatra tripayagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā /
GP12brndp1_u:3024: tatreṣṭvā tu gataḥ siddhiṃ śakraḥ sarvaiḥ suraiḥ saha // BndP_1,18.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:3026: dṛśyate bhāsvaro rātrau devī tripathagā tu sā // BndP_1,18.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:3029: tasyā ye bindavaḥ kecit kruddhāyāḥ patitā bhuvi /
GP12brndp1_u:3030: kṛtaṃ tu tairbidusarastato bindusaraḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,18.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:3031: tato nirūddhā sā devī bhavena smayatā kila /
GP12brndp1_u:3034: jñātvā tamyā abhiprāyaṃ krūraṃ devyāścikīrṣitam // BndP_1,18.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:3038: etasminneva kāle tu dṛṣṭvā rājānamagrataḥ // BndP_1,18.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3040: anena toṣitaścāhaṃ nadyarthaṃ pūrvameva tu // BndP_1,18.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3041: buddhāsya varadānaṃ ca kopaṃ niyatavāṃstu saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3042: brahmaṇo vacanaṃ śrutvā dhāraya svarṇadīmiti // BndP_1,18.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3046: tisraḥ ptācīmimukhaṃ pratīcīṃ tisra eva tu // BndP_1,18.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:3048: nalinī hlādinī caiva pāvanī caiva prācyagāḥ // BndP_1,18.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:3052: saptaitā bhāvayantīdaṃ himāhvaṃ varṣameva tu // BndP_1,18.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:3053: prasūtāḥ sapta nadyastāḥ śubhā bindu sarodbhavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3055: upagacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3058: kṛtvā tridhā siṃhavantaṃ sītāgātpaścimoda dhim // BndP_1,18.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3062: daradāṃśca sakāśmīrān gāndharān raurasān kuhān // BndP_1,18.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:3079: tatastu pāvanī cāpi prācīmeva diśaṃ yayau /
GP12brndp1_u:3084: tatastu nalinī prāyāt prācīmāśāṃ javena tu // BndP_1,18.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:3086: pūrvandeśāṃśca sevantī bhittvā sā bahudhāgirīn // BndP_1,18.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:3091: upagacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3092: vakvaukasāyāstīre tu vanaṃ surabhi viśrutam // BndP_1,18.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:3096: kuberānucarā hyete catvārastu samāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,18.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:3102: saro viṣṇupadaṃ nāma niṣadhe parvatottame // BndP_1,18.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:3103: tasmāddvayaṃ prabhavati gāndharvī nākulī ca taiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3105: tatra jaṃbūnadī puṇyā yasyā jāṃbūnadaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:3106: payodaṃ tu saro nīle suśubhraṃ puṇḍarīkavat // BndP_1,18.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:3109: jyotsnā ca mṛgākāmā ca tasmāddve saṃbabhūvatuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3114: tebhyaḥ śāntā ya mādhvī ca dve nadyau saṃbabhūvatuḥ // BndP_1,18.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:3115: yāni kiṃpuruṣādyāni teṣu devo na varṣati /
GP12brndp1_u:3124: āyatāste mahāśailāḥ samudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ prati // BndP_1,18.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:3126: tatra saṃvarttako nāma so 'gniḥ pibati tajjalam // BndP_1,18.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:3128: dvādaśaite praviṣṭā hi parvatā lavaṇodadhim // BndP_1,18.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:3131: bhāratasya tu varṣasya bhedāste nava kīrttitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3136: vasaṃti nānājātīni teṣu varṣeṣu tāni vai /
GP12brndp1_u:3137: ityeṣā dhārayantīdaṃ pṛthvī viśvaṃ jagatsthitam // BndP_1,18.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:3138: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:3140: sūta uvāca plakṣadvīpaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvadiha saṃgrahāt /
GP12brndp1_u:3141: śṛṇutemaṃ yathātattvaṃ bruvato me dvijottamāḥ // BndP_1,19.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:3145: tatra puṇyā janapadāścirānna mriyate janaḥ // BndP_1,19.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:3146: kṛta eva ca durbhikṣaṃ jarāvyādhibhayaṃ kutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3147: tatrāpi parvatāḥ puṇyāḥ saptaiva maṇibhūṣaṇāḥ // BndP_1,19.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:3149: blakṣadvīpādiṣu tveṣu sapta sapta tu pañcasu // BndP_1,19.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:3151: plakṣadvīpe tu vakṣyāmi saptadvīpān mahā balān // BndP_1,19.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:3153: khyāyate yasya nāmnā tu varṣaṃ gomedasaṃjñitam // BndP_1,19.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:3159: chandamṛtyuḥ purā tasmindundubhiḥ sāditaḥ suraiḥ // BndP_1,19.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:3161: pañcamaḥ somako nāma devairyatrāmṛtaṃ purā // BndP_1,19.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3163: ṣaṣṭastu sumanā nāma saptamarṣabha ucyate // BndP_1,19.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3165: vaibhrājaḥ saptamastatra bhrājiṣṇuḥ sphāṭiko mahān // BndP_1,19.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:3167: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi nāmatastu yathākramam // BndP_1,19.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:3169: candrasya śiśiraṃ nāma nāradasya sukhodayam // BndP_1,19.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:3171: kṣemakaṃ vṛṣabhasyāpi vaibhrājasya dhruvaṃ tathā // BndP_1,19.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:3173: viharanti ramante ca dṛśyamānāśca taiḥ saha // BndP_1,19.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:3177: amṛtā sukṛtā caiva saptaitāḥ saritāṃ varāḥ // BndP_1,19.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:3179: bahūdakā hyoghavatyo yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // BndP_1,19.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3180: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadījanapadāstu te /
GP12brndp1_u:3181: śubhāḥ śāntabhayāścaiva pramudaṃ śaiśirāḥ śivāḥ // BndP_1,19.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3185: avasarpiṇī na teṣvasti tathaivotsarpiṇī na ca // BndP_1,19.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:3187: tretāyugasamaḥ kālaḥ sarvadā tatra varttate // BndP_1,19.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:3198: plakṣo nāma mahāvṛkṣastasya nāmnā sa ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3199: sa tatra pūjyate sthāne madhye janapadasya ha // BndP_1,19.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:3207: tatrāpi parvatāḥ sapta vijñeyā ratnayonayaḥ // BndP_1,19.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:3209: prathamaḥ sūryasaṃkāśaḥ kumudo nāma parvataḥ // BndP_1,19.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3211: dvitīyaḥ parvataścātra hyuttamo nāma viśrutaḥ // BndP_1,19.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3213: tṛtiyaḥ parvatastatra balāhaka iti śrutaḥ // BndP_1,19.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3215: caturthaḥ parvato droṇo yatra sā vai sahoṣadhiḥ // BndP_1,19.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:3225: teṣāṃ varṣāṇi vakṣyāmi sarpaiva tu śubhāni vai // BndP_1,19.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:3227: balāhakasya jīmūtaṃ droṇasya haritaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,19.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:3228: kaṅkasya vaidyutaṃ nāma mahiṣasya ca mānasam /
GP12brndp1_u:3229: kakudaḥ supradaṃ nāma saptaitāni tu saptadhā // BndP_1,19.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3231: jyotiḥ śāntistathā tuṣṭā candrā śukrā vimocanī // BndP_1,19.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:3232: nivṛttiḥ saptamī tāsāṃ prativarṣaṃ tu tāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3235: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vaḥ śālmalasya prakīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:3239: vistarācchālmalasvaiva same na tu samantataḥ // BndP_1,19.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:3241: yathāśrutaṃ yathānyāyaṃ bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,19.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:3246: kuśadvīpe tu vijñeyaḥ parvato vidrumaśca yaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3251: mandā iti hyapā nāma mandaro dāraṇādayam // BndP_1,19.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:3253: udbhidaṃ prathamaṃ varṣaṃ dvitīyaṃ veṇumaṇḍalam // BndP_1,19.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:3254: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ lavaṇaṃ samṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:3255: pañcamaṃ dhṛtimadvarṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram // BndP_1,19.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:3256: saptamaṃ kapilaṃ nāma sarve te varṣa bhāvakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3259: na teṣu dasyavaḥ saṃti mleccha jātaya eva ca // BndP_1,19.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:3260: gauraprāyo janaḥ sarvaḥ kramācca mriyate tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3261: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva dhūtapāpāśivā tathā // BndP_1,19.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:3264: abhigacchanti tāḥ sarvā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3267: ityeṣa sanniveśo vaḥ kuśadvīpasya kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:3269: kuśadvīpasya vistārāddviguṇaḥ sa tu vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:3271: tasmindvīpe nagaśreṣṭhaḥ kraiñcastu prathamo giriḥ // BndP_1,19.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:3277: ete ratnamayāḥ sapta kraiñcadvīpasya parvatāḥ // BndP_1,19.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:3281: kraiñcasya kuśalo deśo vāmanasya manonugaḥ // BndP_1,19.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:3287: tatrāpi nadyaḥ saptaiva prativarṣa smṛtāḥ śubhāḥ // BndP_1,19.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:3289: khyātiśca puṇḍarīkā ca gaṅgāḥ saptavidhāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:3291: abhigacchanti tāḥ sarvā vipulāḥ subahūdakāḥ // BndP_1,19.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:3297: nisargo yaḥ prajānāṃ tu saṃhāro yaśca tāsu vai // BndP_1,19.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:3299: śṛṇudhvaṃ tu yathātathyaṃ bruvato me yathārthavat // BndP_1,19.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:3301: parivārya samudraṃ sa dadhimaṇḍodakaṃ sthitaḥ // BndP_1,19.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:3303: kuta eva ca durbhikṣaṃ jarāvyādhibhayaṃ kutaḥ // BndP_1,19.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:3305: ratnākarāstathā nadyasteṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu // BndP_1,19.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:3307: prāgāyataḥ sa sauvarṇo hyudayo nāma parvataḥ // BndP_1,19.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:3308: vṛṣṭyarthaṃ jaladāstatra prabhaṃvati ca yānti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3311: tato varṣaṃ prabhavati varṣākāle prajāsviha // BndP_1,19.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:3313: revatī divi nakṣatraṃ pitāmahakṛto vidhiḥ // BndP_1,19.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:3319: kesarī kesarayuto yato vāyuḥ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,19.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:3322: raivatasya tu kaumāraṃ śyāmasya ca maṇīvakam /
GP12brndp1_u:3323: astasyāpi śubhaṃ varṣaṃ vijñeyaṃ kusumottaram // BndP_1,19.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:3325: dvīpasya parimāṇaṃ tu hrasvadīrghatvameva ca // BndP_1,19.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:3327: śāko nāma mahotsedhastasya pūjyā mahānugāḥ // BndP_1,19.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:3330: sukumārī kumārī ca nalinī veṇukā ca yā /
GP12brndp1_u:3331: ikṣuśca veṇukā caiva gabhastiḥ saptamī tathā // BndP_1,19.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:3333: sahasraśaḥ samākhyātā yato varṣati vāsavaḥ // BndP_1,19.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:3334: na tāsāṃ nāmadheyāni parimāṇaṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3335: śakyaṃ vai parisaṃkhyātuṃ puṇyāstāḥ sariduttamāḥ // BndP_1,19.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:3336: tāḥ pibanti sadā hṛṣṭā nadīrjanapadāstu te /
GP12brndp1_u:3345: varṇāśramasamākīrṇā deśāste sapta vai smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:3348: na teṣu lobho māyā vā hīrṣāsūyākṛtaḥ kutaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3349: viparyayo na teṣvasti kālātsvābhāvikaṃ param // BndP_1,19.105 //
GP12brndp1_u:3350: karāvāptirna teṣvasti na daṇḍo na ca daṇḍyakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3351: svadharmeṇaiva dharma jñāste rakṣanti parasparam // BndP_1,19.106 //
GP12brndp1_u:3355: puṣkareṇa tu dvīpena vṛtaḥ kṣīrodako bahiḥ // BndP_1,19.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:3357: puṣkare parvataḥ śrīmāneka eva mahāśilaḥ // BndP_1,19.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:3359: dvīpasya tasya pūrvarddhe citrasānuḥ sthito mahān // BndP_1,19.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:3363: sthito velāsamīpe tu navacandra ivoditaḥ // BndP_1,19.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:3365: tāvadeva ca vistīrṇaḥ sarvataḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ // BndP_1,19.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:3367: eka eva mahāsāraḥ sanniveśo dvidhā kṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.114 //
GP12brndp1_u:3370: tasmindvīpe smṛtau dvau tu puṇyau janapadau śubhau /
GP12brndp1_u:3371: abhito mānasasyātha parvatasya tu maṇḍale // BndP_1,19.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:3372: mahāvītaṃ tu yadvarṣa bāhyato mānasasya tat /
GP12brndp1_u:3377: adhamottamā na teṣvasti tulyāste rūpaśīlataḥ // BndP_1,19.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:3378: na tatra dasyurdamako nerṣyāsūyā bhayaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3379: nigraho na ca daṇḍo 'sti na lobho na parigrahaḥ // BndP_1,19.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:3380: satyānṛtaṃ na tatrāsti dharmādharmauṃ tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3381: varṇāśramau vā vārtā vā pāśupālyaṃ vaṇikpathaḥ // BndP_1,19.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:3382: trayī vidyā daṇḍanītiḥ śuśrūṣā śilpameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3384: na tatra varṣaṃ nadyo vā śītoṣṇaṃ vāpi vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3388: ityeṣa dhātakīkhaṇḍe mahā vīte tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3395: apāṃ caiva samudrekātsāmudra iti saṃjñitaḥ // BndP_1,19.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:3397: tasmādvarṣamiti proktaṃ prajānāṃ sukhadaṃ yataḥ // BndP_1,19.129 //
GP12brndp1_u:3399: ratiprabadhanātmiddhaṃ varṣaṃ tatteṣu tena vai // BndP_1,19.130 //
GP12brndp1_u:3405: mahodadhigataṃ toyaṃ svata udricyate tathā // BndP_1,19.133 //
GP12brndp1_u:3409: daśottarāṇi pañcaiva hyaṅgulāni śatāni ca // BndP_1,19.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:3410: apāṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayo dṛṣṭaḥ sāmudrīṇāṃ tu parvasu /
GP12brndp1_u:3413: aparvāṇastu girayaḥ parvabhiḥ parvatāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,19.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:3415: śālmaliḥ śālmale dvīpe pūjyate sumahāvrataiḥ // BndP_1,19.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:3417: kraiñcadvīpe giriḥ kaiñco madhye janapadasya ha // BndP_1,19.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:3418: śākadvīpe drumaḥ śākastasya nāmnā sa ucyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3419: nyagrodhaḥ puṣkaradvīpe tatratyaiḥ sa namaskṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:3421: tasminni vasati brahmā sādhyaiḥ sārddhaṃ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,19.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:3423: sa tatra pūjyate caiva deverdevotamotamaḥ // BndP_1,19.142 //
GP12brndp1_u:3425: dvīpeṣu teṣu sarveṣu prajānāṃ kramatastu vai // BndP_1,19.143 //
GP12brndp1_u:3426: sarvaśo brahmavaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3431: sa viṣṇoḥ sacivo devaḥ sa pitā sa pitāmahaḥ // BndP_1,19.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:3433: ṣaḍrasaṃ sumahāvīryaṃ bhuñjate tu prajāḥ sadā // BndP_1,19.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:3441: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśa tasyocchrayaḥ samṛtaḥ // BndP_1,19.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:3445: lokavistāramātraṃ tu hyalokaḥ sarvato bahiḥ // BndP_1,19.153 //
GP12brndp1_u:3451: etāvāneva vijñeyo lokāntaścaiva yaḥ paraḥ // BndP_1,19.156 //
GP12brndp1_u:3461: bāhyato ghanato yasya tiryagūrddhvaṃ tu maṇḍalam // BndP_1,19.161 //
GP12brndp1_u:3465: ghanavātaṃ tathākāśo dadhānaḥ khalu tiṣṭhati // BndP_1,19.163 //
GP12brndp1_u:3467: mahāśca so 'pyanantena hyavyaktena tu dhāryate // BndP_1,19.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:3477: mahato devadevasya maryādā yā vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,19.169 //
GP12brndp1_u:3479: te lokā ityabhihitā jagatasca na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_1,19.170 //
GP12brndp1_u:3485: vicitrā jagataḥ sā vai prakṛtirbrahmaṇaḥ sthitā // BndP_1,19.173 //
GP12brndp1_u:3489: mānasasya tu dehasya anantasya dvijottamāḥ // BndP_1,19.175 //
GP12brndp1_u:3490: kṣayo vā pariṇāmo vā anto vāpi na vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3491: ananta eṣa sarvatra evaṃ jñāneṣu paṭhyate // BndP_1,19.176 //
GP12brndp1_u:3493: yaḥ padmanābhanāmnā tu tatkārtsnyena ca kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,19.177 //
GP12brndp1_u:3494: sa eva sarvatra gataḥ sarvasthāneṣu pūjyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3495: bhūmau rasātale caiva ākāśe pavane 'nale // BndP_1,19.178 //
GP12brndp1_u:3496: arṇaveṣu ca sarveṣu divi caiva na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3497: tathā tamasi vijñeya eṣa eva mahādyutiḥ // BndP_1,19.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:3499: sarvalokeṣu lokeśa ijyate bahudhā prabhuḥ // BndP_1,19.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:3509: bhūtebhyaḥ paratastebhyo vyālokā sā dharā smṛtā // BndP_1,19.185 //
GP12brndp1_u:3511: pātre mahati pātrāṇi yathaivāntargatāni tu // BndP_1,19.186 //
GP12brndp1_u:3513: tathā hyāloka ākāśe bhedāstvantargatā matāḥ // BndP_1,19.187 //
GP12brndp1_u:3517: pratyā khyāya tu bhūtāni kāryotparttina vidyate // BndP_1,19.189 //
GP12brndp1_u:3520: ityeṣa saṃniveśo vai mayā prokto vibhāgaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3527: etāvadeva śrotavyaṃ saṃniveśe tu pārtheve // BndP_1,19.194 //
GP12brndp1_u:3533: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi kṛthivyā vai vicakṣaṇāḥ // BndP_1,19.197 //
GP12brndp1_u:3534: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:3536: sūta uvāca adhaḥpramāṇamūrddhva ca vakṣyamāṇaṃ nibodhata /
GP12brndp1_u:3551: evaṃ matamanantasya bhautikasya na vidyate // BndP_1,20.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:3553: bhūmirjalamathā kāśamiti yā yā paraṃparā // BndP_1,20.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:3557: prathamaṃ tatvalaṃ nāma sutalaṃ tu tataḥ param // BndP_1,20.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:3559: tator'vākca talaṃ nāma parataśca rasātalam // BndP_1,20.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:3564: ṣaṣṭhaḥ śilāmayo jñeyaḥ sauvarṇaḥ saptamaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3567: puraṃ ca śaṅkukarṇasya kabandhasya ca mandiram // BndP_1,20.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:3569: rākṣasasya ca bhīmasya śūladantasya cālayam // BndP_1,20.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:3571: dhanañjayasya ca puraṃ nāgendrasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,20.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:3572: kāliyasya ca nāgasya nagaraṃ kauśikasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3574: tale jñeyāni prathame kṛṣṇabhaume na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3575: dvitīye sutale viprā daityendrasya ca rakṣasaḥ // BndP_1,20.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:3576: mahājaṃbhasya tu tathā nagaraṃ prathamasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:3577: iyagrīvasya kṛṣṇasya nikumbhasya ca mandiram // BndP_1,20.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:3578: śaṅkhakhyasya ca daityasya nagaraṃ gomukhasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3579: rākṣasasya ca nīlasya meghasya kathanasya ca // BndP_1,20.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:3581: kaṃbalasya ca nāgasya puramaśvatarasya ca // BndP_1,20.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:3584: dvitīye 'smin tale viprāḥ pāṇḍubhaume na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3585: tṛtīye tu tale khyātaṃ prahlādasya mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,20.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:3587: tārakāśyasya ca puraṃ puraṃ triśirasastathā // BndP_1,20.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:3588: śiśumārasya ca puraṃ tripurasya tathā puram /
GP12brndp1_u:3590: cyavanasya tu vijñeyaṃ rākṣasasya ca mandiram /
GP12brndp1_u:3591: rākṣaseṃdrasya ca puraṃ kumbhilasya kharasya ca // BndP_1,20.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:3593: hemakasya ca nāgasya tathā pāṇḍurakasya ca // BndP_1,20.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:3594: maṇināgasya ca puraṃ kapilasya ca mandiram /
GP12brndp1_u:3597: tṛtīye 'smiṃstale viprā nīlabhaume na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_1,20.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:3599: gajakarṇasya ca puraṃ nagaraṃ kuñjarasya ca // BndP_1,20.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:3607: puraṃ ca vidyujjihvasya rākṣasendrasya dhīmataḥ // BndP_1,20.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:3609: kirmīrasya ca nāgasya svastikasya jayasya ca // BndP_1,20.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:3613: suparvaṇaḥ pulomnaśca nagaraṃ mahiṣasya ca // BndP_1,20.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:3615: tatrāste suramāputraḥ śataśīrṣo mudā yutaḥ // BndP_1,20.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:3619: saptame tu tale jñeyaṃ pātāle sarvapaścime // BndP_1,20.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:3627: pātālānte ca viprendrā vistīṇa bahuyojane // BndP_1,20.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:3635: sa tu netrasahasreṇa dviguṇena virājatā // BndP_1,20.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:3643: sa rājā sarvanāgānāṃ śeṣo 'nanto mahādyutiḥ // BndP_1,20.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:3652: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde 'dholokavarṇanaṃ nāma viṃśatitamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:3653: sūta uvāca sūryā candramasāvetau bhramato yāvadeva tu /
GP12brndp1_u:3655: saptānāṃ tu samudrāṇāṃ dvīpānāṃ satu vistaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3660: avidhātuḥ prakāśākhyo hyavanātsa raviḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,21.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:3668: atha pṛthivyā vakṣyāmi pramāṇaṃ yojanaiḥ saha // BndP_1,21.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:3673: devā ye vai vyatītāstu rūpairnāmabhireva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3695: maharlloko janaścaiva tapaḥ satyaṃ ca saptamam /
GP12brndp1_u:3696: ete sapta kṛtā lokāśchatrākārā vyavasthitāḥ // BndP_1,21.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:3706: bhūtādinā vṛtaṃ sarvaṃ bhūtādirmahatā vṛtaḥ // BndP_1,21.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:3710: meroḥ prācyāṃ diśi tathā mānasasyaiva mūrddhani // BndP_1,21.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:3713: vaivasvato niva sati yamaḥ saṃyamane pure /
GP12brndp1_u:3715: sukhā nāma purī ramyā varuṇasyāpi dhīmataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3716: varuṇo yādasāṃ nāthassukhākhye vasate pure // BndP_1,21.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:3722: kāṣṭhāgatasya sūryasya gatiyā tāṃ nibodhata // BndP_1,21.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:3733: teṣāmapararātraśca ye janā uttarāḥ pare // BndP_1,21.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:3737: vibhāyāṃ somapuryāṃ vā uttiṣṭhati vibhāvasuḥ // BndP_1,21.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:3739: somapuryā vibhāyāṃ tu madhyāhne syāddivākaraḥ // BndP_1,21.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:3743: bhramanvai bhramamārṇāni ṛkṣāṇi carate raviḥ // BndP_1,21.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:3744: evaṃ caturṣu pārśveṣu dakṣiṇāṃ tena sarpati /
GP12brndp1_u:3745: udayāstamane cāsāvṛtti ṣṭhati punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,21.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:3746: pūvāhṇe cāparāhṇe ca dvau dvau devālayau tu saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3747: tapatyarkaśca madhyāhne taireva ca svaraśmibhiḥ // BndP_1,21.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:3753: praṇāśaṃ gacchate yatra teṣāmastaḥ sa ucyate // BndP_1,21.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:3756: līyante raśmayo yasmāttena rātrau na dṛśyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3759: śuklacchāyo 'gnirā paśca kṛṣṇacchāyā ca medinī // BndP_1,21.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:3762: lekhāyāmāsthitaḥ sūryo yatra yatra ca dṛśyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3763: ūrddhva śātasahasra tu yojanānāṃ sa dṛśyate // BndP_1,21.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:3764: prabhā hi saurī pādena hyastaṃ gacchati bhāskare /
GP12brndp1_u:3767: saṃyukto vahninā sūryastapate tu tato divā // BndP_1,21.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:3768: prākāśyaṃ ca tathauṣṇyaṃ ca saurāgneye ca tejasī /
GP12brndp1_u:3770: uttare caiva bhūmyarddhe tathā tasmiṃśca dakṣiṇe /
GP12brndp1_u:3773: astaṃ yāti punaḥ sūrye dinamāviśate tvaṣaḥ // BndP_1,21.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:3779: evaṃ puṣkaramadhyena yadā sarpati bhāskaraḥ // BndP_1,21.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:3784: mauhūrtti kī gatirhyeṣā sūryasya tu vidhīyate /
GP12brndp1_u:3785: etena gatiyogena yadā kāṣṭhāṃ tu dakṣiṇām // BndP_1,21.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:3788: mānasottaraśaile tu antare viṣuvaṃ ca tat /
GP12brndp1_u:3789: sarpate dakṣiṇāyāṃ tu kāṣṭhāyāṃ vai nibodhata // BndP_1,21.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:3791: tathā śatasahasrāṇi catvāriṃśacca pañca ca // BndP_1,21.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:3800: utarāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ ca kāṣṭhāyā maṇḍalasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3801: yojanāgrātprasaṃkhyātā koṭirekā tu sa dvijāḥ // BndP_1,21.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:3817: bāhyato dakṣiṇe caiva satataṃ tu yathākramam // BndP_1,21.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:3819: carate dakṣiṇe cāpi tāvadeva vibhāvasuḥ // BndP_1,21.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:3825: viṣkaṃbho maṇḍalasyātha tiryak sa tu vidhīyate // BndP_1,21.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:3826: pratyahaṃ carate tāni sūryā vai maṇḍalakramāt /
GP12brndp1_u:3829: tasmātprakṛṣṭāṃ bhūmiṃ tu kālenālpena gacchati // BndP_1,21.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:3833: kulālacakramadhye tu yathā mandaṃ prasarpati // BndP_1,21.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:3835: tasmā ddīrghena kālena bhūmiṃ svalpāni gacchati // BndP_1,21.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:3837: aho bhavati taccāpi carate mandavikramaḥ // BndP_1,21.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:3840: tato mandataraṃ nābhyāṃ cakraṃ bhramati vai yathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3841: mṛtpiṇḍa iva madhyastho dhruvo bhramati vai tathā // BndP_1,21.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:3843: ubhayoḥ kāṣṭhayormadhye bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // BndP_1,21.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:3847: divānaktaṃ ca sūryasya mandā śīghrā ca vai gātiḥ // BndP_1,21.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:3849: tathaiva ca punarnaktaṃ śīghrā sūryasya vai gātiḥ // BndP_1,21.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:3851: gatiḥ sūryasya naktaṃ ca mandā caiva gatistathā // BndP_1,21.99 //
GP12brndp1_u:3853: tajāpi saṃcaranmārgaṃ samena viṣameṇa ca // BndP_1,21.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:3861: yojanānāṃ sahasrāṇi daśakaṃ tucchrito giriḥ // BndP_1,21.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:3869: uṣā rātriḥ smṛtā viprairvyuṣṭiścāpi tvahaḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,21.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:3873: tisraḥ koṭyastu vikhyātā mandehā nāma rākṣasāḥ // BndP_1,21.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:3877: tato brahmā ca devāśca brāhmamāścaiva sattamāḥ // BndP_1,21.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:3878: saṃdhyāṃ tu samupāsīnāḥ prakṣipanti jalaṃ sadā /
GP12brndp1_u:3885: kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caiva triṃśacca kāṣṭhā gaṇayetkalāṃ tu /
GP12brndp1_u:3888: saṃdhyā muhūrttamātrā tu hrāsavṛddhistu sā smṛtā /
GP12brndp1_u:3890: prātastataḥ smṛtaḥ kālo bhāgaścāhnaḥ sa pañcamaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3894: traya eva muhūrttāstu kālāgaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3895: aparāhṇe vyatīte tu kālaḥ sāyāhna ucyate // BndP_1,21.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:3898: varddhante ca hrasaṃte ca hyayane dakṣiṇottare /
GP12brndp1_u:3899: ahastu grasate rātriṃ rātriśca grasate tvahaḥ // BndP_1,21.123 //
GP12brndp1_u:3901: ahorātre kalāścaiva samaṃ somaḥ samaśnute // BndP_1,21.124 //
GP12brndp1_u:3904: ṛtutritayamayane dve hi varṣaṃ tu saurakam /
GP12brndp1_u:3905: nimeṣā vidyutaścaiva kāṣṭāstā daśa pañca ca // BndP_1,21.126 //
GP12brndp1_u:3909: catvāri śatsahasrāṇi śatānyaṣṭau ca vidyutaḥ // BndP_1,21.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:3911: catvāryeva śatānyāhurvidyute dve ca saṃyute // BndP_1,21.129 //
GP12brndp1_u:3912: varāṃśo hyeṣa vijñeyo nāḍikā cātra kāraṇam /
GP12brndp1_u:3921: pañca ca triśataṃ cāpi ṣaṣṭivarṣaṃ ca bhāskaram // BndP_1,21.134 //
GP12brndp1_u:3924: ahnāṃ tu tryadhikāśītiḥ śataṃ cāpyadhikaṃ bhavet /
GP12brndp1_u:3926: sauraṃ saumyaṃ tu vijñeyaṃ nākṣatraṃ sāvanaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:3927: mānānyetāni catvāri yaiḥpurāṇe hi niścayaḥ // BndP_1,21.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:3929: trīṇitasya tu śṛṅgāṇi spṛśantīva nabhastalam // BndP_1,21.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:3932: tasya vai pūrvataḥ śṛṅgaṃ madhyamaṃ taddhiraṇmayam /
GP12brndp1_u:3933: dakṣiṇaṃ rājataṃ caiva śṛṅgaṃ tu sphaṭikaprabham // BndP_1,21.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:3935: evaṃ kūṭaistribhiḥ śailaḥ śṛṅgavāniti viśrutaḥ // BndP_1,21.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:3941: meṣati ca tulānte ca bhāskarodayataḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3942: muhūrttā daśa pañcaiva aho rātriśca tāvatī // BndP_1,21.144 //
GP12brndp1_u:3943: kṛttikānāṃ yadā sūryaḥ prathamāṃ śagato bhavet /
GP12brndp1_u:3948: sūryeṇa viṣuvaṃ vidyā tkālaṃ somena lakṣayet /
GP12brndp1_u:3949: samā rātrirahaścaiva yadā tadviṣuvaṃ bhavet // BndP_1,21.148 //
GP12brndp1_u:3950: tadā dānāni deyāni pitṛbhyo viṣuveṣu ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3953: paurṇamāsī tathā jñeyā amāvāsyā tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:3957: ārtavāśca tato jñeyā pañcābdā brahmaṇāḥ sutāḥ // BndP_1,21.152 //
GP12brndp1_u:3958: tasmācca ṛtavo jñeyā ṛtubhyo hyārttavāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3961: parva jñātvā na muhyeta pitrye daive ca mānavaḥ // BndP_1,21.154 //
GP12brndp1_u:3963: ālokāttu smṛto loko lokālokaḥ sa ucyate // BndP_1,21.155 //
GP12brndp1_u:3969: lokapālāḥ sthitā hyete lokāloke caturdiśam // BndP_1,21.158 //
GP12brndp1_u:3971: pitṛyānaḥ sa vai panthā vaiśvānarapathādvahiḥ // BndP_1,21.159 //
GP12brndp1_u:3975: prārabhante lokakāmāsteṣāṃ panthāḥ sa dakṣiṇāḥ // BndP_1,21.161 //
GP12brndp1_u:3977: saṃtaptāstapasā caiva maryādābhiḥ śrutena ca // BndP_1,21.162 //
GP12brndp1_u:3978: jāyamānāstu pūrve vai paścimānāṃ gṛhe ṣviha /
GP12brndp1_u:3983: kriyāvatāṃ prasaṃkhyaiṣā ye śmaśānāni bhejire // BndP_1,21.165 //
GP12brndp1_u:3987: etaistaiḥ kāraṇaiḥ siddhā ye śmaśānāni bhejire // BndP_1,21.167 //
GP12brndp1_u:3990: uttaraḥ savituḥ panthā devayānaśca sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:3991: yatra te vāsinaḥ siddhā vimalā brahmacāriṇaḥ // BndP_1,21.169 //
GP12brndp1_u:3995: te saṃprayogāllokasya maithunasya ca varjanāt // BndP_1,21.171 //
GP12brndp1_u:4003: urddhvottaramṛṣibhyastu dhruvo yatra sa vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,21.175 //
GP12brndp1_u:4005: yatra gatvā na śocanti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam /
GP12brndp1_u:4007: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:4009: sūta uvāca svāyaṃbhūvanisarge tu vyākhyātānyantarāṇi ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4010: bhaviṣyāṇi ca sarvāṇi teṣāṃ vakṣyāmyanukramam // BndP_1,22.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:4015: avyūhena ca sarvāṇi tathaivāsaṃkareṇa vā // BndP_1,22.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:4016: kaścidbhāmayate tāni bhramante yadi vā svayam /
GP12brndp1_u:4018: sūta uvāca bhūtasaṃmohanaṃ hyetadvadato me nibodhata /
GP12brndp1_u:4019: pratyakṣamapi dṛśyaṃ ca saṃmohayati yatprajāḥ // BndP_1,22.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:4022: sa vai bhrāmayate nityaṃ candrādityau grahaiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:4024: dhruvasya manasā cāsau sarvate jyotiṣāṃ gaṇaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4025: sūryācandramasau tārā nakṣatrāṇi grahaiḥ saha // BndP_1,22.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:4027: teṣāṃ yogaśca bhedaśca kālaścārastathaiva ca // BndP_1,22.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:4030: varṣā gharmo himaṃ rātriḥ saṃdhyā caiva dinaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:4031: śubhāśubhaṃ prajānāṃ ca dhruvātsarvaṃ pravarttate // BndP_1,22.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:4033: tadeṣa dīpta kiraṇaḥ sa kālagnirdivākaraḥ // BndP_1,22.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:4037: ādityapītaṃ sakalaṃ somaḥ saṃkramate jalam // BndP_1,22.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:4051: somādhārā nadī gaṅgā pavitrā vimalodakā // BndP_1,22.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:4055: dhūmabhūtāstu tā hyāpo niṣkāmantīha sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,22.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:4065: vāyavyaṃ stanitaṃ caiva vaidyutaṃ cāgnisaṃbhavam // BndP_1,22.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:4067: na bhraśyanti yataścāpastadabhaṃ kavayo viduḥ // BndP_1,22.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:4075: jīmūtā nāma te meghā hyetebhyo jīvasaṃbhavaḥ // BndP_1,22.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:4079: parvatāgra nitaṃbeṣu varṣati ca rasaṃti ca // BndP_1,22.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:4081: brahmajā nāma te meghā brahmaniśvāsasaṃbhavāḥ // BndP_1,22.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:4086: dvitīyaṃ pravahaṃ vāyuṃ meghāste tu samāśritāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4089: puṣkarāvarttakā nāma te meghāḥ pakṣasaṃbhavāḥ // BndP_1,22.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:4104: gajānāṃ parvatānāṃ ca meghānāṃ bhogibhiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:4105: kulamekaṃ pṛthagbhūtaṃ yonirekā jalaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,22.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:4111: tasyā niṣyandatoyāni diggajāḥ pṛthubhiḥ karaiḥ // BndP_1,22.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:4112: śīkaraṃ saṃpramuñcanti nīhāra iti sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4113: dakṣiṇena giriryo 'sau hemakūṭa iti smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,22.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:4115: puṇḍraṃ nāma samākhyātaṃ nagaraṃ tatra vistṛtam // BndP_1,22.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:4123: sūrya eva tu vṛṣṭīnāṃ sraṣṭā samupadiśyate // BndP_1,22.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:4127: graho niḥsṛtya sūryāttu kṛtsne nakṣatramaṇḍale // BndP_1,22.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:4133: cakreṇa bhāsvatā sūryaḥ syandanena prasarpati // BndP_1,22.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:4136: sa tasya brahmaṇā sṛṣṭo ratho hyarthavaśena tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4137: asaṃgaḥ kāñcano divyo yuktaḥ pavanagairhayaiḥ // BndP_1,22.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:4140: tenāsau sarvate vyomni bhāsvatā tu divākaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4141: athaitāni tu sūryasya pratyaṅgāni rathasya ha // BndP_1,22.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:4143: ahastu nābhiḥ saurasya ekacakrasya vai smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,22.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:4145: rathanīḍaḥ smṛto hyeṣa cāyane kūbarāvubhau // BndP_1,22.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:4147: tasya kāṣṭhā smṛtā ghoṇā akṣadaṇḍaḥ kṣaṇastu vai // BndP_1,22.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:4149: rātrirvarūtho dharmo 'sya dhvaja ūrddhva samucchritaḥ // BndP_1,22.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:4153: paṅktiśca bṛhatī caiva hyuṣṇikcaiva tu saptamī // BndP_1,22.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:4154: cakramakṣe nibaddhaṃ tu dhruve cākṣaḥ samarpitaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4155: sahacakro bhramatyakṣaḥ sahakṣo bhramate dhruvaḥ // BndP_1,22.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:4159: tenāsau taraṇirdevo bhāsvatā sarpate divi // BndP_1,22.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:4161: dhruve tau bhrāmyate raśmī ca cakrayugayostu vai // BndP_1,22.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4163: yugākṣakoṭī te tasya dakṣiṇe syandanasya hi // BndP_1,22.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:4165: bhramantamanugacchetāṃ dhruvaṃ raśmī tu tāvubhau // BndP_1,22.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:4167: kīlāsaktā yathā rajjurbhraṃmate sarvato diśam // BndP_1,22.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:4169: varddhate dakṣiṇe caiva bhramato maṇḍalāni tu // BndP_1,22.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:4171: dhruveṇa pragṛhītau vai tau raśmī nayato ravim // BndP_1,22.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:4172: ākṛṣyete yadā tau vai dhruveṇa sama dhiṣṭhitau /
GP12brndp1_u:4173: tadā so 'bhyantare sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu // BndP_1,22.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:4175: dhruveṇa mucyamānābhyāṃ raśmibhyāṃ punareva tu // BndP_1,22.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:4176: tathaiva bāhyataḥ sūryo bhramate maṇḍalāni tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4177: udveṣāṭayansa vegena maṇḍalāni tu gacchati // BndP_1,22.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:4178: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:4182: ete vasaṃti vai sūrye dvau dvau māsau krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4188: ete vasaṃti vai sūryye madhumādhavayoḥ sadā /
GP12brndp1_u:4190: tathā vasiṣṭho vikhyātaḥ sahajanyā ca menakā /
GP12brndp1_u:4191: rākṣasau ca samākhyātau pauruṣeyo vadhastathā // BndP_1,23.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:4195: tataḥ sūrye punastvanyā nivasaṃtīha devatāḥ // BndP_1,23.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:4199: pramlocā iti vikhyātānumloceti ca te ubhe // BndP_1,23.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:4202: śaradyanyāḥ punaḥ śubhrā vasaṃti munidevatāḥ parjanyaścaiva pūṣā ca bhāradvājaḥ sagautamaḥ parāvasuśca gandharvastathaiva suruciśca yaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4203: viśvācī ca ghṛtācī ca ubhe te śubhalakṣaṇe // BndP_1,23.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:4205: ścenajicca suṣeṇaśca senīrgrāma ṇīśca tau // BndP_1,23.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:4207: vasaṃtyete tu vai sūrye sadaivāśvinakartike // BndP_1,23.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:4208: haimantikau tu dvau māsau vasaṃti ca divākare /
GP12brndp1_u:4209: aṃśo bhagaśca dvāvaitau kaśyapaśya kratuśca ha // BndP_1,23.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:4215: sahe caiva sahasye ca vasaṃtyete divākare // BndP_1,23.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:4226: ete devā vasaṃtyarke dvau dvau māsau krameṇa tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4229: grathitaiḥ svairvacobhiśca stuvanti hyṛṣayo ravim // BndP_1,23.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:4232: sarpā vahanti vai sūryaṃ yātudhānāstu yānti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4237: ityete nivasaṃtīha dvau dvau māsau divākare // BndP_1,23.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:4239: grāmaṇyaśca tathā yakṣā yātudhānāśca mukhyaśaḥ // BndP_1,23.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:4240: ete tapanti varṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4241: bhūtānāṃ caśubhaṃ karma vyapohanti prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,23.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:4243: duritaṃ supracārāṇāṃ vyapohanti kvaci tkvacit // BndP_1,23.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:4245: varṣantaśca tapantaśca hlādayantaśca vai prajāḥ // BndP_1,23.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:4248: atītānāgatānāṃ ca varttante sāṃprataṃ ca ye /
GP12brndp1_u:4249: evaṃ vasaṃti vai sūrye saptakāste caturdaśa /
GP12brndp1_u:4251: grīṣme ca varṣāsu ca muñcamāno gharmaṃ himaṃ varṣa dinaṃ niśāṃ ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4252: gacchatyasāvṛtuvaśātparivṛttaraśmirdevān pitṝṃśca manujāṃśca hi tarpayanvai // BndP_1,23.37
GP12brndp1_u:4253: prīṇāti devānamṛtena sūryaḥ somaṃ suṣumṇena ca varddhayitvā /
GP12brndp1_u:4254: śukle tu pūrṇaṃ divasakrameṇa taṃ kṛṣṇapakṣe vibudhāḥ pibanti //
GP12brndp1_u:4255: pītaṃ ca somaṃ hi kalāvaśiṣṭaṃ kṛṣṇakṣaye raśmibhirakṣarantam /
GP12brndp1_u:4256: sudhāmṛtaṃ tatpitaraḥ pibanti devāśca saumyāśca tathaiva kāvyāḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:4259: tṛptiśca śukle sudhayā surāṇāṃ pakṣe ca kṛṣṇe sudhayā pitaṇām /
GP12brndp1_u:4262: visargakāle visṛjaṃśca tāḥ punarbibhartti śaśvatsavitā carācaram //
GP12brndp1_u:4263: harirharidbhirhri yate turaṅgamaiḥ pibatyathāpo haribhiḥ sahasradhā /
GP12brndp1_u:4264: tataḥ pramuñcatyapi tāstvasau hariḥ samūhyamāno haribhisturaṅgamaiḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:4280: vāmadakṣiṇato yuktā daśa tena carantyasau // BndP_1,23.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:4284: apāṃ garṇātsamutpanno rathaḥ sāśvaḥ sasārathiḥ // BndP_1,23.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:4290: yajuścaṇḍamanāścaiva vṛṣo vājī naro hayaḥ // BndP_1,23.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:4292: ityete nāmabhiḥ sarve daśa candramaso hayāḥ // BndP_1,23.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:4293: ete candramasaṃ devaṃ vahanti saha dīkṣayā /
GP12brndp1_u:4294: devaiḥ parivṛtaḥ somaḥ pitṛbhiścaiva gacchati // BndP_1,23.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:4298: kṣīṇaṃ pañcadaśāhaṃ tu raśminaikena bhāskaraḥ // BndP_1,23.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:4300: suṣumṇāpyāyamānasya śuklā varddhanti vai kalāḥ // BndP_1,23.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:4301: tasmāddhrasaṃti vai kṛṣṇe śukle svāpyāyayanti tam /
GP12brndp1_u:4304: evamāpyāyitaḥ somaḥ śukla pakṣe dinakramāt // BndP_1,23.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:4310: ekāṃ rātriṃ suraiḥ sarvaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ sarṣibhiḥ saha // BndP_1,23.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:4312: prakṣīyante pidṛdevaiḥ pīyamānāḥ kalāḥ kramāt // BndP_1,23.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:4314: trayaśca trisahasrāśca devāḥ somaṃ pibanti vai // BndP_1,23.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:4315: ityetaiḥ pīyamānasya kṛṣṇā varddhati vai kalāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4316: kṣīyanti tasmācchuklāśca kṛṣṇā āpyāyayanti ca // BndP_1,23.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:4318: pītvārddha māsaṃ gacchanti cāmāvāsyāṃ surottamāḥ // BndP_1,23.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:4322: pibanti dvilavaṃ kālaṃ śiṣṭāstasya kalāstu yāḥ // BndP_1,23.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:4324: tāṃ svadhāṃ māsatṛptyai ca pītvā gacchanti te 'mṛtam // BndP_1,23.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:4328: kāvyaścaiva tu ye proktāḥ pitaraḥ sarva eva te // BndP_1,23.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:4329: saṃvatsarāstu vai kāvyāḥ pañcābdā ye dvicaiḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4330: saumyāstu ṛtuvo jñeyā māsā barhiṣadaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,23.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4332: pitṛbhiḥ pīyamānasya pañcadaśyāṃ kalā tu vai // BndP_1,23.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:4334: amāvāsyāṃ tadā tasya tata āpūryate paraḥ // BndP_1,23.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:4335: vṛddhakṣayau vai pakṣādau ṣoḍaśyāṃ śaśinaḥ smṛtā /
GP12brndp1_u:4338: teyatejomayaḥ śubhraḥ somaputrasya vai rathaḥ // BndP_1,23.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:4342: śvetaḥ piśaṅgaḥ sāraṅgo nīlaḥ pīto vilohitaḥ // BndP_1,23.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:4353: kārṣṇāyasaṃ samāruhya syandanaṃ yāti vai śanaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4354: svarbhānośca tathaivāśvāḥ kṛṣṇā hyaṣṭau manojavāḥ // BndP_1,23.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:4355: rathaṃ tamomayaṃ tasya sakṛdyuktā vahaṃ tyuta /
GP12brndp1_u:4356: ādityānniḥsṛto rāhuḥ somaṃ gacchati parvasu // BndP_1,23.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:4358: atha keturathasyāśvā aṣṭau vai vātaraṃhasaḥ // BndP_1,23.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:4360: ete vāhā grahāṇāṃ ca hyupākhyātā rathaiḥ saha // BndP_1,23.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:4362: tapante brāmyamāṇāstu yathāyogaṃ bhramanti vai // BndP_1,23.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:4366: yathā nahyudake naustu salilena saho hyate // BndP_1,23.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:4368: sarppamāṇā na dṛśyante vyomni devagaṇāstu te // BndP_1,23.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:4370: sarvā dhruve nibaddhāśca bhramantyo bhrāmayanti tāḥ // BndP_1,23.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:4371: tailapīḍā yathā cakraṃ bhramanto bhrāmayanti ha /
GP12brndp1_u:4372: tathā bhramanti jyotīṃṣi vātabaddhāni sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,23.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:4374: yato jyotīṃṣi vahate pravahastena sa smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,23.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:4376: saiṣa tārāmayo jñeyaḥ śiśumāro dhruvo divi // BndP_1,23.99 //
GP12brndp1_u:4382: yajñaḥ parastu vijñeyo dharmo marddhānamāśritaḥ // BndP_1,23.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:4384: varuṇaścāryamā caiva paścime tasya sakthinī // BndP_1,23.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:4386: pucche 'gniśca mahendraśca mārīcaḥ kaśyapo dhruvaḥ // BndP_1,23.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:4389: unmukhā vimukhāḥ sarve vakrībhūtāḥ śritā divi /
GP12brndp1_u:4392: agnīndrakaśyapānāṃ tu caramo 'sau dhruvaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,23.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:4398: sūta uvāca etacchrutvā tu sunayaḥ punaste saṃśayānvitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4401: kathaṃ devagṛhāṇi syuḥ kathaṃ jyotīṃṣivarṇaya // BndP_1,24.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:4403: vāyuruvāca śrutvā tu vacanaṃ teṣāṃ tadā sūtaḥ samāhitaḥ // BndP_1,24.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:4409: divyasya bhautikasyāgnerabyoneḥ pārthi vasya tu // BndP_1,24.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:4418: yaścāsau tapate sūrye śuciragnistu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4423: mānavā nāṃ ca kukṣistho nādbhiḥ śāsyati pāvakaḥ // BndP_1,24.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:4425: kiñcidapsu mataṃ tejaḥ kiñciddṛṣṭamabiṃ dhanam // BndP_1,24.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:4429: prabhā saurī tu pādena hyastaṃ yāti devākare // BndP_1,24.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:4433: prākāśyaṃ ca tathauṣṇyaṃ ca saurāgneye tu tejasī // BndP_1,24.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:4435: uttare caiva bhūmyarddhe tathā hyagniśca dakṣiṇe // BndP_1,24.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:4438: astaṃ yāti puna sūrye aharvai praviśatyapaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4439: tasmānnaktaṃ punaḥ śuklā āpo 'dṛśyanta bhāsvarāḥ // BndP_1,24.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:4445: ādatte sa tu nāḍīnāṃ sahasreṇa samantataḥ // BndP_1,24.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:4447: sthāvarā jaṅgamāścaiva yāśca kulyādikā apaḥ // BndP_1,24.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:4449: tāsāṃ catuḥśatā nāḍyo varṣante citra mūrttayaḥ // BndP_1,24.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:4451: amṛtā nāmataḥ sarvā raśmayo vṛṣṭisarjanāḥ // BndP_1,24.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:4453: dṛśyā meghāśca yāmyaśca hradinyo himasarjanāḥ // BndP_1,24.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:4460: vasaṃte caiva grīṣme ca śataiḥ sa tapati tribhiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4461: varṣāsvatho śaradi vai caturbhiśca pravarṣati // BndP_1,24.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:4462: hemante śiśire caiva hima mutsṛjate tribhiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4463: indro dhātā bhagaḥ pūṣā mitro 'tha varuṇor'yamā // BndP_1,24.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:4465: māghamāse tu varuṇaḥ pūṣā caiva tu phalālgune // BndP_1,24.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:4468: vivasvāñchrāvaṇe māsi proṣṭhe māse bhāgaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4469: parjanyo 'śvayuje māsi tvaṣṭā ca kārtike raviḥ // BndP_1,24.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:4479: śvetavarṇastu varṣāsu pāṇḍuḥ śaradi bhāskaraḥ // BndP_1,24.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:4481: iti varṇāḥ samā khyātāḥ sūryasyartusamudbhavāḥ // BndP_1,24.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:4482: auṣadhīṣu balaṃ dhatte svadhayā ca pidṛṣvapi /
GP12brndp1_u:4483: sūryo 'mareṣvapyamṛtaṃ trayaṃ triṣu na yacchati // BndP_1,24.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:4489: nakṣatrādhipatiḥ somo graha rājo divākaraḥ // BndP_1,24.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:4490: śeṣāḥ pañca grahā jñeyā īśvarāḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4491: paṭhyate cāgnirāditya udakaṃ candramāḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,24.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:4495: rudro vaivasvataḥ sākṣādyamo lokaprabhuḥ svayam // BndP_1,24.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:4497: devāsuragurū dvau tu bhānumantau mahā grahau // BndP_1,24.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:4505: tataḥ saṃjāyate sarvaṃ tatra caiva pralīyate // BndP_1,24.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:4507: jagajjñeyo graho viprā dīptimānsuprabho raviḥ // BndP_1,24.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:4508: atra gacchanti nidhanaṃ jāyante ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4509: kṣaṇā muhūrttā divasā niśāḥ pakṣāśca kṛtsnaśaḥ // BndP_1,24.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:4511: tadādityādṛte hyeṣā kālaṃsakhyā na vidyate // BndP_1,24.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:4512: kālādṛte na nigamo na dīkṣā nāhnikakramaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4515: abhāvo vyavahārāṇāṃ jantūnāṃ divi caiha ca // BndP_1,24.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:4517: sa eṣa kālaścāgniśca dvādaśātmā prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,24.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:4519: sa eṣa tecasāṃ rāśistamo ghransārvalaukikam // BndP_1,24.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:4527: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ punaḥ sapta raśmayo grahayo nayaḥ // BndP_1,24.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:4533: hari keśaḥ purastādya ṛkṣayoniḥ sa kītyate // BndP_1,24.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:4535: viśvaśravāstu yaḥ paścacchukrayoniḥ smṛto budhaiḥ // BndP_1,24.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:4536: saṃpadvasustu yo raśmiḥ sa yonirlohitasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:4540: vartnte divi tāḥ sarvā viśvaṃ caidaṃ punarjagat /
GP12brndp1_u:4546: divyānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca naiśānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4549: svanāttejaso 'pāṃ ca tenāsau savitā mataḥ // BndP_1,24.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4551: śuklatve cāmṛtatve ca śītatve ca vibhāvyate // BndP_1,24.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:4555: ghanatejomayaṃ śuklaṃ maṇḍalaṃ bhāskarasya tu // BndP_1,24.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:4559: sauraṃ sūryo viśetsthānaṃ saumyaṃ somastathaiva ca // BndP_1,24.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:4560: śaukraṃ śukro viśetsthānaṃ ṣoḍa śārciḥ prabhāsvaram /
GP12brndp1_u:4561: jaivaṃ bṛhaspatiścaiva lauhitaṃ caiva lohitaḥ // BndP_1,24.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:4565: gṛhāṇyetāni sarvāṇi jyotīṃṣi sukṛtātma nām // BndP_1,24.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:4570: atītaistu sahātītā bhāvyā bhāvyaiḥ suraiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:4572: asminmanvantare caiva grahā vaitānikāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,24.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:4574: tviṣināmā dharmasutaḥ somo devo vasuḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,24.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:4576: bṛhattejāḥ smṛto devo devācāryo 'gi rassutaḥ // BndP_1,24.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:4586: āpyaṃ śyāmaṃ manojñasya pañcaraśmergṛhaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,24.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:4590: aṣṛ raśmigṛhaṃ proktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ mandasya cāmmayam // BndP_1,24.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:4602: ādityāttacca niṣkramya somaṃ gacchati parvasu // BndP_1,24.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:4608: bṛhaspateḥ pāda hīnau bhaumasaurāvubhau smṛtau // BndP_1,24.105 //
GP12brndp1_u:4610: tārānakṣatrarūpāṇi vapuṣmanti ca yāni vai // BndP_1,24.106 //
GP12brndp1_u:4614: śatāni pañca catvāri trīṇi dve caiva yojane // BndP_1,24.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:4616: yojanādyarddhamātrāṇi tebhyo hrasvaṃ na vidyate // BndP_1,24.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:4628: na dṛśyate yathākālaṃ śīghramastamupaiti ca // BndP_1,24.115 //
GP12brndp1_u:4630: dṛśyate dakṣiṇe mārge niyamāddṛśyate na ca // BndP_1,24.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:4637: vistīrṇa maṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā tasyorddhva carate śaśī /
GP12brndp1_u:4642: ṛṣīṇāṃ cāpi saptānāṃ dhruva ūrddhvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ // BndP_1,24.122 //
GP12brndp1_u:4645: grahāśca candrasūryauṃ ca divi divyena teja sā /
GP12brndp1_u:4646: nityamṛkṣeṣu yujyante gacchanto niyatāḥ kramāt // BndP_1,24.124 //
GP12brndp1_u:4648: samāgame ca bhede ca paśyanti yugapatprajāḥ // BndP_1,24.125 //
GP12brndp1_u:4650: asaṃkareṇa vijñeyasteṣāṃ yogastu vai budhaiḥ // BndP_1,24.126 //
GP12brndp1_u:4651: ityevaṃ sanniveśo vai vṛthivyā jyautiṣasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4652: dvipānāmudadhīnāṃ ca parvatānāṃ tthaiva ca // BndP_1,24.127 //
GP12brndp1_u:4653: varṣāṇāṃ ca nadīnāṃ ca ye ca teṣu vasaṃti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:4654: eteṣveva grahāḥ sarve nakṣatreṣu samutthitāḥ // BndP_1,24.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:4656: viśākhāsu samutpanno grahāṇāṃ prathamo grahaḥ // BndP_1,24.129 //
GP12brndp1_u:4662: phālgunīṣu samutpannaḥ pūrvāsu ca jagadguruḥ // BndP_1,24.132 //
GP12brndp1_u:4664: āṣāḍhāsviha pūrvāsu samutpanna iti śrutiḥ // BndP_1,24.133 //
GP12brndp1_u:4666: saumyo budho dhaniṣṭhāsu pañcārcirudito grahaḥ // BndP_1,24.134 //
GP12brndp1_u:4672: ete tārā grahāścāpi boddhavyā bhārgavādayaḥ // BndP_1,24.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:4677: dhruvaḥ kīlo grahāṇāṃ tu vibhaktānāṃ caturddiśam /
GP12brndp1_u:4680: ṛtūnāṃ śiśiraścāpi māsānāṃ māgha eva ca // BndP_1,24.141 //
GP12brndp1_u:4684: kṣaṇaścāpi nimeṣādiḥ kālaḥ kālavidāṃ varāḥ // BndP_1,24.143 //
GP12brndp1_u:4700: parikṣya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā śraddhātavyaṃ vipaścitā // BndP_1,24.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:4701: cakṣuḥ śāstraṃ jalaṃ lekhyaṃ gaṇitaṃ buddhivittamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4703: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:4706: jjāpa japyaṃ bhagavānmadhyaṃ prāpte divākare // BndP_1,25.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:4709: ya ijyo niyamasyānte prāṇināṃ jīvanaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4714: te sma pṛcchanti vāyu ca vāyuparṇāṃbu bhojanāḥ // BndP_1,25.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:4716: etadguhyaṃ pavitrāṇāṃ puṣṇaṃ puṇyavidāṃ varaḥ // BndP_1,25.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:4724: tvayi niṣpūyamāne tu śeṣā varṇapravṛttayaḥ // BndP_1,25.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:4726: tvatto hi varṇasadbhāvaḥ sarvagastvaṃ sadānila // BndP_1,25.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:4728: eṣa vai jīvalokaste pratyakṣaḥ sarvato 'nila // BndP_1,25.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:4730: brūhi tatkaṇṭhadeśe tu kiṃ kṛtvā rūpavikriyā // BndP_1,25.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:4734: vasiṣṭho nāma dharmātmā mānaso vai prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,25.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:4742: etaddīptāṃya dāntāya bhaktāya brūhi pṛcchate // BndP_1,25.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:4749: pārvatyā saha saṃvādaḥ śarvasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4785: sukhopaviṣṭaṃ madanāganāśanaṃ provāca vākyaṃ girirājaputrī // BndP_1,25.40
GP12brndp1_u:4789: kimidaṃ dīpyate deva kaṇṭhe kāmāṅganāśana // BndP_1,25.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:4790: ko hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ vā kaṇṭhe nīlasttvamīśvara /
GP12brndp1_u:4791: etatsarvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ būhi kautūhalaṃ hi me // BndP_1,25.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:4794: maheśvara uvāca mathyamāne 'mṛte pūrvaṃ kṣīrode suradānavaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4799: kimarthaṃ vai mahābhāgā bhītā udvignacetanāḥ // BndP_1,25.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:4801: tena vyāvarttitaiśvaryā yūyaṃ bho surasattamāḥ // BndP_1,25.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:4803: prajāsarge na so 'stīha yaścājñāṃ me 'tivartayet // BndP_1,25.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:4805: ādhyātmike cādhibhūte adhidaive ca nityaśaḥ // BndP_1,25.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:4807: tatkimarthaṃ bhayodvignā mṛgāḥ siṃhārditā iva // BndP_1,25.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:4808: kiṃ duḥśaṃ ko 'nusaṃtāpaḥ kuto vā bhayamāgatam /
GP12brndp1_u:4819: taṃ dṛṣṭvā raktagaurāṅgaṃ kṛtaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ janārddanam // BndP_1,25.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:4820: tataḥ sarve vayaṃ bhītāstvā meva śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4821: surāṇāmasurāṇāṃ ca śrutvā vākyaṃ bhayāvaham // BndP_1,25.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:4823: śṛṇvantu devatāḥ sarve ṛṣayaśca tapodhanāḥ // BndP_1,25.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:4827: tasya viṣṇurahaṃ vāpi sarve vā surapuṅgavāḥ // BndP_1,25.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:4828: na śaknuvanti vai soḍhuṃ vegamanyatra śaṅkarāt /
GP12brndp1_u:4831: tataḥ stotuṃ samārabdho brahmā veda vidāṃ varaḥ // BndP_1,25.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:4833: namaḥ pinākahastāya vajrahastāya vai namaḥ // BndP_1,25.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:4836: brahmaṇe caiva rudrāya viṣṇave caiva te namaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4837: sāṃkhyāya caiva yogāya bhūtagrāmāya vai namaḥ // BndP_1,25.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:4841: kapāline virūpāya śivāya varadāya ca // BndP_1,25.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:4843: vṛddhāya caiva śuddhāya muktāyaiva balāya ca // BndP_1,25.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:4847: nityāya caivānityāya nityānityāya vai namaḥ // BndP_1,25.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:4849: cintyāya caivācintyāya cintyācintyāya vai namaḥ // BndP_1,25.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:4853: bahurūpāya muṇḍāya daṇḍine ca varūthine // BndP_1,25.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:4855: dhanvine rathine caiva yamine brahmacāriṇe // BndP_1,25.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:4857: ityeva mādicaritaiḥ stotraiḥ stutya namī'stu te /
GP12brndp1_u:4858: evaṃ stutvā tato brahmā praṇipatya varānane // BndP_1,25.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:4859: jñātvā tu bhaktiṃ mama devatānāṃ gaṅgājalā sphālitamuktakeśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4860: sūkṣmo 'si yogātiśayādacintyo na hi prabho vyaktimuphaiṣi rudraḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:4865: kiṃ kāryaṃ te mayā brahmankarttavyaṃ vada suvrata /
GP12brndp1_u:4866: śrutvā vākyaṃ tato brahmā pratyuvācāṃbujekṣaṇaḥ // BndP_1,25.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:4871: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ca vayaṃ sarve bhītāḥ saṃbhrāntacetasaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4874: tvadṛte 'nyo mahādeva vegaṃ soḍhuṃ na vidyate // BndP_1,25.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:4875: evaṃ tasya vacaḥ śrutvā brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4876: bāḍha mityeva tadvākyaṃ pratigṛhya varānane // BndP_1,25.85 //
GP12brndp1_u:4878: pibato me mahāghoraṃ viṣaṃ surabhayapradam // BndP_1,25.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:4889: niveśyamānaṃ suradaityasaṃgho dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayamājagāma // BndP_1,25.91
GP12brndp1_u:4892: ahobalaṃ vīryaparākramaste tvaho vapuryogabalaṃ taveśa // BndP_1,25.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:4893: aho prabhutvaṃ tava devadeva mahādbhutaṃ manmathadehanāśana /
GP12brndp1_u:4896: tvameva vahniḥ pavanastvameva tvameva bhūmiḥ salilaṃ tvameva //
GP12brndp1_u:4897: tvameva sarvasya carācarasya dhātā vidhātā pralayastvameva /
GP12brndp1_u:4898: ityeva muktvā vacanaṃ suredrāḥ pragṛhya somaṃ praṇipatya mūrdhrā /
GP12brndp1_u:4901: nīlakaṇṭha iti proktaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:4902: svayaṃbhuvā svayaṃ proktā kathā pāpapraṇāśinī // BndP_1,25.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:4904: tasyāhaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi phalaṃ suvipulaṃ mahat // BndP_1,25.99 //
GP12brndp1_u:4905: viṣaṃ tasya varārohe sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:4906: gātraṃ prāpya tu suśroṇi kṣapraṃ tatpratihanyate // BndP_1,25.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:4908: strīṣu vallabhatāṃ yāti sabhāyāṃ pārthivasya ca // BndP_1,25.101 //
GP12brndp1_u:4916: na hanyate gati stasya anilasya yathāṃbare // BndP_1,25.105 //
GP12brndp1_u:4918: mama bhaktayā varārohe ye ca śṛmvanti mānavāḥ // BndP_1,25.106 //
GP12brndp1_u:4919: teṣāṃ gatiṃ pravakṣyāmi tviha loke paratra ca /
GP12brndp1_u:4920: brāhmaṇo vedamāpnoti kṣatriyo vindate mahīm // BndP_1,25.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:4922: vyādhito mucyate rogādbaddho mucyeta bandhanāt // BndP_1,25.108 //
GP12brndp1_u:4923: gurviṇī labhate putraṃ kanyā vidati satpatim /
GP12brndp1_u:4924: naṣṭaṃ ca labhate dravyamiha loke paratra ca // BndP_1,25.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:4926: tatphalaṃ labhate martyaḥ śrutvā divyā mimāṃ kathām // BndP_1,25.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:4927: pādaṃ vāthārddhapādaṃ vār ślokarṃ ślokārddhameva vā /
GP12brndp1_u:4928: yastu dhārayate nityaṃ rudralokaṃ sa gacchati // BndP_1,25.111 //
GP12brndp1_u:4931: śraddhadhānaḥ sadā bhakto rūdralokaṃ sa gacchati /
GP12brndp1_u:4932: paṭhecca devi bhaktyā ca pāṭhayecca naraḥ sadā // BndP_1,25.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:4933: ataḥ parataraṃ stotraṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
GP12brndp1_u:4934: nāpi yakṣāḥ piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4935: kuryurvighnaṃ gṛhe tasya yatrāyaṃ tiṣṭhati stavaḥ // BndP_1,25.114 //
GP12brndp1_u:4936: mayā nu tuṣṭena tavāṃbujekṣaṇe stavasya māhātmyama ghaughanāśanam /
GP12brndp1_u:4937: niveditaṃ puṇyaphalādiyuktaṃ svayaṃ ca kītaṃ caturānanena // BndP_1,25.115
GP12brndp1_u:4939: vṛṣasya pṛṣṭhena sahomayā prabhujagāma kailāsaguhāṃ guhapriyaḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:4940: śrutaṃ mayā pāpaharaṃ tadantike niveditaṃ te 'tha mayā prajāpateḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4941: adhītya sarvaṃ tvakhilaṃ salakṣaṇaṃ prayāti cādityapadaṃ dvijottamaḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:4942: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrva bhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:4944: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ mahādevasya mahātmyaṃ prabhutvaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4946: sūta uvāca pūrvaṃ trailokyavijaye viṣṇunā samudātdṛ tam /
GP12brndp1_u:4947: baliṃ baddhvā mahāvīryaṃ trailokyādhipatiṃ purā // BndP_1,26.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:4948: pranaṣṭeṣu tu daityeṣu prahṛṣṭe tu śacīpatau /
GP12brndp1_u:4949: athājagmuḥ prabhuṃ draṣṭuṃ sarve devāḥ sanātanam // BndP_1,26.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:4951: siddhā brahmarṣayo yakṣā gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // BndP_1,26.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:4952: nāgā devarṣayaścaiva nadyaḥ sarve ca parvatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4953: abhigamya mahātmānaṃ stuvanti puruṣaṃ harim // BndP_1,26.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:4954: tvaṃ dhātā tvaṃ ca kartāsi tvaṃ lokānsṛjasi prabho /
GP12brndp1_u:4956: asurāśca jitāḥ sarve balirbaddhaśca vai tvayā /
GP12brndp1_u:4960: yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ kālaḥ kālakaraḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4961: yenāhaṃ brahmaṇā sārddhaṃ sṛṣṭā lokāśca māyayā // BndP_1,26.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:4963: purā tamasi cāvyakte trailokye grasite mayā // BndP_1,26.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:4965: sahasraśīrṣā bhūtvā ca sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt // BndP_1,26.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:4973: kastvaṃ kuto vā ki ceha tiṣṭhase vada me vibho // BndP_1,26.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:4976: ahaṃ karttā hi lokānāṃ saṃhartā ca punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4979: jvālāṃ tatastāmālokya vismitau ca tadānaghāḥ // BndP_1,26.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:4980: tejasā ca balenātha śārvaṃ jyotiḥ kṛtāñjalī /
GP12brndp1_u:4982: abhidudrāva tāṃ jvālāṃ brahmā cāhaṃ ca satvarau /
GP12brndp1_u:4983: divaṃ bhūmiṃ ca nirbhidya tiṣṭhantaṃ javālamaṇḍalam // BndP_1,26.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:4984: tasyā jvālasya madhye tu paśyāvo vipulaprabham /
GP12brndp1_u:4986: na ca tatkāñcanaṃ madhye naśailaṃ na ca rājatam /
GP12brndp1_u:4987: anirdeśyamacintyaṃ ca lakṣyālakṣyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,26.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:4992: tato māmabravīdbrahmā adho gaccha tvamāśu vai /
GP12brndp1_u:4993: antamasya vijānīvo liṅgasya tu mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,26.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:4995: tadā tu samayaṃ kṛtvā gata urddhvamadhaśca hi // BndP_1,26.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:4996: tato varṣasahasraṃ tu hyahaṃ punaradho gataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:4997: na paśyāmi ca tasyāntaṃ bhītaścāhaṃ tato 'bhavam // BndP_1,26.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:4998: tathaiva brahmā hyūdhva ca na cāntaṃ tasya labdhavān /
GP12brndp1_u:4999: samāgato mayā sārddha tatraiva ca mahābhasi // BndP_1,26.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:5001: māyayā mohitau tena naṣṭasaṃjñai vyavasthitau // BndP_1,26.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:5003: prabhavaṃ nidhanaṃ caiva laukānāṃ prabhumavyayam // BndP_1,26.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:5007: namo 'stu te lokasureśa deva namo 'stu te bhūtapate mahātman /
GP12brndp1_u:5008: namo 'stu te śāśvatasiddhayogine namostu te sarvajagatpratiṣṭhita //
GP12brndp1_u:5009: parameṣṭhī paraṃ brahma tvakṣaraṃ paramaṃ padam /
GP12brndp1_u:5010: jyeṣṭhastvaṃ vāmadevaśca rudraḥ skandaḥ śivaḥ prabhuḥ // BndP_1,26.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:5014: vedā lokāśca devāśca bhagavāneva sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,26.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:5016: bhūmau gandho rasaścāpsu tejorūpaṃ maheśvaraḥ // BndP_1,26.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:5018: buddhau jñānaṃ ca deveśa prakṛterbījameva ca // BndP_1,26.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:5020: tvaṃ dhārayasi lokāṃstrīṃstvameva sṛjasi prabho // BndP_1,26.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:5022: dakṣiṇena tu vaktreṇa lokānsaṃkṣipase punaḥ // BndP_1,26.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:5023: paścimena tu vaktreṇa varuṇastho na saṃśayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5024: uttareṇa tu vaktreṇa somastvaṃ devasattamaḥ // BndP_1,26.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:5026: ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaśca sahāśvinaḥ // BndP_1,26.42 //

GP12brndp1_u:5115: rākṣaso vā piśāco vā dānavo vātha vā tathā /

GP12brndp1_u:5125: indrasyāpi hi dharmajñaḥ śiśnaṃ savṛṣaṇaṃ purā /

GP12brndp1_u:5130: dharmaścātra praśapto vai māṇḍavyena mahātmanā // BndP_1,27.25 //

GP12brndp1_u:5137: yatīnāṃ vā tathā dharmo nāyaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ kathañcana /

GP12brndp1_u:5140: vadasva vācā madhuraṃ vastramekaṃ samāśraya // BndP_1,27.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:5141: tyājite ca tvayā liṅge tataḥ pūjāmavāpsyasi /
GP12brndp1_u:5144: na śakyamidamasmā kaṃ liṅgaṃ pātayituṃ balāt // BndP_1,27.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:5147: āśrame tiṣṭha vā gaccha vākyamityeva te 'bruvan /

GP12brndp1_u:5152: vyākulaṃ ca tadā sarvaṃ na prakāśeta kiñcana // BndP_1,27.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:5159: dharme caiva matisteṣāṃ tadā na vyavatiṣṭhate /

GP12brndp1_u:5170: tasya krodhaprasādārthaṃ vayaṃ te śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // BndP_1,27.45 //

GP12brndp1_u:5173: pratyuvāca tato brahmā vākyaṃ ca susamā hitaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5174: eṣa devo mahādevo vijñeyastu maheśvaraḥ // BndP_1,27.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:5176: devānāṃ ca ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṛṇāṃ caiva sa prabhuḥ // BndP_1,27.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:5178: saṃharatyeṣa bhagavān kālo bhūtvā maheśvaraḥ // BndP_1,27.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:5179: eṣa caiva prajāḥ sarvāḥ sṛjatyekaḥ svatejasā /

GP12brndp1_u:5271: atulamiha mahātamaḥ praṇāśaṃśivakathitaṃ paramaṃ vidhiṃ viditvā /

GP12brndp1_u:5302: bhāsayatyeva yadbhasma śubhaṃ vāsayate ca yat /
GP12brndp1_u:5304: ūṣmapāḥ pitaro jñeyā devā vai somasaṃbhavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5307: ahamagniśca somaśca prakṛtyā puruṣaḥ svayam // BndP_1,27.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:5309: svavīryaṃ vapuṣā caiva dhārayāmīti vai sthitiḥ // BndP_1,27.113 //

GP12brndp1_u:5334: garimā pañcamī caiva ṣaṣṭhaṃ prākāmyameva ca /

GP12brndp1_u:5337: aiśvaryaṃ paramaṃ prāpya sarve prathitatejasaḥ // BndP_1,27.127 //
