GP12brndp1_u:5344: ṛṣiruvāca agātkathamamāvasyāṃ māsi māsi divaṃ nṛpaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5345: ailaḥ purūravāḥ sūta kathaṃ vātarpayatpitṝn // BndP_1,28.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:5346: sūta uvāca tasya te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi prabhāvaṃ śāṃśapāyane /
GP12brndp1_u:5349: hrāsavṛddhī pidṛmataḥ pitryasya ca vinirṇayam // BndP_1,28.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:5353: etatsarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi parvāṇi ca yathākramam // BndP_1,28.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:5354: yadā tu candrasūryauṃ vai nakṣatreṇa samāgatau /
GP12brndp1_u:5358: abhivādya sa tau tatra kālāpekṣaḥ pratīkṣate /
GP12brndp1_u:5361: upāste pitṛmantaṃ taṃ somaṃ divi samāsthitaḥ // BndP_1,28.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:5362: dvilavāṃ kuhūmātrāṃ ca te ubhe tu vicārya saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5364: kuhūmātraḥ kalāṃ caiva jñātvopāste kuhūṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:5365: sa tadā tāmupāsīnaḥ kālāpekṣaḥ prapaśyati // BndP_1,28.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:5369: sadyaḥ prakṣaratā tena saumyena madhunā tu saḥ // BndP_1,28.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:5371: sudhāmṛtena rājaindrastarpa yāmāsa vai pitṝn // BndP_1,28.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:5373: ṛtamagnistu yaḥ proktaḥ sa tu saṃvatsaro mataḥ // BndP_1,28.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:5377: prapitāmahāstu vai devāḥ pañcābdā brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ // BndP_1,28.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:5378: saumyāstu somajā jñeyāḥ kāvyā jñeyāḥ kaveḥ sutāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5379: upahūtāḥ smṛtā devāḥ somajāḥ somapāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,28.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:5381: kāvyā barhiṣada ścaiva agniṣvāttāśca tāstridhā // BndP_1,28.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:5382: gṛhasthā ye ca yajvāna ṛturbarhiṣado dhruvam /
GP12brndp1_u:5385: teṣāṃ saṃvatsaro hyagniḥ sūyastu parivatsaraḥ // BndP_1,28.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:5389: ye te pibantyamāvasyāṃ māsimāsi sudhāṃ divi // BndP_1,28.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:5391: yasmātprasravate somānmāsi māsi dhinoti ca // BndP_1,28.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:5393: evaṃ tadamṛtaṃ saumyaṃ sudhā ca madu caiva ha // BndP_1,28.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:5394: kṛṣṇapakṣe yathā vendoḥ kalāḥ pañcadaśa kramāt /
GP12brndp1_u:5399: suṣumṇāpyāyitaṃ caiva hyamāvasyāṃ yathā kramam // BndP_1,28.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:5403: niḥ śeṣāyāṃ kalāyāṃ tu somamāpyāyayatpunaḥ // BndP_1,28.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:5405: kalāḥ kṣīyanti tāḥ kṛṣṇāḥ śuklā cāpyāyayanti tam // BndP_1,28.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:5407: dṛśyate paurṇamāsyāṃ vai śuklaḥ saṃpūrṇamaṇḍalaḥ // BndP_1,28.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:5411: ataḥ parvāṇi vakṣyāmi varvaṇāṃ saṃdhayaśca ye // BndP_1,28.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:5413: tathārddhamāsi parvāṇi śuklakṛṣṇāni caiva hi // BndP_1,28.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:5415: arddhamāsaṃ tu parvāṇi dvitīyāprabhṛtīni tu // BndP_1,28.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:5419: lavau dvāveva rākāyāṃ kālo jñeyo 'parāhṇakaḥ // BndP_1,28.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:5421: sāyāhne pratipanne ca sa kālaḥ paurṇamāsikaḥ // BndP_1,28.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:5422: vyatīpāte sthite sūrye lekhārddhe tu yugāntare /
GP12brndp1_u:5423: yugāntarodite caiva leśārddhe śaśinaḥ kramāt // BndP_1,28.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:5425: yasminkāle samau syātāṃ tau vyatīpāta eva saḥ // BndP_1,28.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:5426: taṃ kālaṃ sūryanirddeśyaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃkhyāṃ tu sarpati /
GP12brndp1_u:5427: sa vai vaṣaṭākriyākālaḥ sadyaḥ kālaṃ vidhīyate // BndP_1,28.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:5429: tato virajyate naktaṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ niśākaraḥ // BndP_1,28.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:5431: candrārkāvaparāhṇe tu pūrṇātmānau tu pūrṇimā // BndP_1,28.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:5437: rākā pañcadaśī rātriramāvāsyā tataḥ smṛtā // BndP_1,28.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:5439: anyonyaṃ candrasūryauṃ tau yadā tadvarśa ucyate // BndP_1,28.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:5440: dvau dvau lavāvamāvāsyā sa kālaḥ parvasaṃdhiṣu /
GP12brndp1_u:5443: divasārddhena rātryā ca sūryaṃ prāpya tu candramāḥ // BndP_1,28.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:5444: sūryeṇa saha sāmudraṃ gatvā prātastanātsa vai /
GP12brndp1_u:5445: dvau kālau saṃgamaṃ caiva madhyāhne niyataṃ raviḥ // BndP_1,28.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:5448: sa tadā hyāhuteḥ kālo darśasya tu vaṣaṭkriyā /
GP12brndp1_u:5450: divāparva hyamāvāsyā kṣīṇendau bahule tu vai /
GP12brndp1_u:5452: gṛhyate tu divā tasmādamāvāsyāṃ divi kṣayām /
GP12brndp1_u:5458: sa tadā hyāhuteḥ kālodarśasya tu vaṣaṭkriyā /
GP12brndp1_u:5459: kuheti kokilenokto yaḥ sa kālaḥ samāpyate // BndP_1,28.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:5467: kālaḥ kahūsinīvālyoḥ sāmudrasya tu madhyataḥ // BndP_1,28.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:5469: evaṃ sa śuklapakṣe vai rajanyāṃ parvasaṃdhiṣu // BndP_1,28.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:5471: yasmādā dāpyāyate somaḥ pañcadaśyāṃ tu pūrṇimā // BndP_1,28.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:5473: tasmātkalāḥ pañcadaśa somenāsya tu ṣoḍaśī // BndP_1,28.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:5475: ityete pitaro devāḥ somapāḥ somavarddhanāḥ // BndP_1,28.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:5478: teṣāṃ gatiṃ satattvāṃ ca prāptiṃ śrāddhasya caiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:5479: na mṛtānāṃ gatiḥ śakyā jñātuṃ na punarāgatiḥ // BndP_1,28.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:5485: pitā pitāmahaścāpi tathā yaḥ prapitāmahaḥ // BndP_1,28.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:5486: yajvāno ye tu sāmena somavantastu te smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5487: ye yajvāno haviryajñe te vai barhiṣadaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,28.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:5489: teṣāṃ tu dharmasādharmyātsmṛtāḥ sāyujyagā dvijaiḥ // BndP_1,28.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:5491: ante tu nāvasīdanti śraddhāyuktāstu karmasu // BndP_1,28.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:5492: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa yajñena prajayā ca vai /
GP12brndp1_u:5493: śrāddhena vidyayā caiva pradānena ca saptadhā // BndP_1,28.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:5495: daivaistaiḥ pitṛbhiḥ sārddhaṃ sūkṣmajaiḥ somayājanaiḥ // BndP_1,28.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:5497: teṣāṃ nivāpe datte tu tatkulīnaiśca bandhubhiḥ // BndP_1,28.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:5509: śālmale vaitaraṇyāṃ ca kuṃbhīpāke tathaiva ca // BndP_1,28.83 //
GP12brndp1_u:5511: śilā saṃpeṣaṇe caiva pātyamānāḥ svakarmabhiḥ // BndP_1,28.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:5512: tatrasthānāṃ hi teṣāṃ vai duḥ khitānāmanāśinām /
GP12brndp1_u:5516: aprāptā yātanāsthānaṃ prabhraṣṭā ya ca pañcadhā /
GP12brndp1_u:5517: paścādye sthāvarānte vai jātā nīcaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ // BndP_1,28.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:5519: yadāhārā bhavantyete tāsu tāsviha yoniṣu // BndP_1,28.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:5521: kāle nyāyāgataṃ pātre vidhinā pratipāditam // BndP_1,28.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:5523: yathā goṣu pranaṣṭāmu vatso vindati mātaram // BndP_1,28.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:5524: tathā śrāddheṣu dattānnaṃ mantraḥ prāpayate pitṝn /
GP12brndp1_u:5525: evaṃ hyaviphalaṃ śrāddhaṃ śraddhādattaṃ tu mantrataḥ // BndP_1,28.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:5527: gatāgatajñaḥ pretānāṃ prāptiṃ śrāddhasya taiḥ saha // BndP_1,28.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:5530: ityete pitaro devā devāśca pitaraśca vai /
GP12brndp1_u:5533: prīteṣu teṣu prīyante śrāddhayukteṣu karmasu // BndP_1,28.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:5535: evaṃ pitṛsatattvaṃ hi purāṇe niścayaṃ gatam // BndP_1,28.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:5537: sudhāmṛtasya ca prāptiḥ pitṝṇāṃ caiva tarppaṇam // BndP_1,28.97 //
GP12brndp1_u:5541: na śakyaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ śraddheyaṃ bhūtimicchatā // BndP_1,28.99 //
GP12brndp1_u:5542: svāyaṃbhuvasya hi hyeṣa sargaḥ krānto mayā tu vai /
GP12brndp1_u:5543: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca bhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmyaham // BndP_1,28.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:5544: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:5547: teṣāṃ nisargaṃ tattvaṃ ca śrotumicchāmi vistarāt // BndP_1,29.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:5551: yugaṃ ca yugabhedaśca yugadharmastathaiva ca // BndP_1,29.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:5556: nimeṣakāla tulyaṃ hi vidyāllaghvakṣaraṃ ca yat // BndP_1,29.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:5557: kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caiva triśacca kāṣṭhā gaṇayetkalāṃ tu /
GP12brndp1_u:5558: triṃśatkalāścāpi bhavenmuhūrttastai striṃśatā rātryahanī same te //
GP12brndp1_u:5561: pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgastayoḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,29.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:5563: triṃśadye mānuṣā māsāḥ pitryo māsastu saḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:5564: śatāni trīṇi māsānāṃ ṣaṣṭyā cāpyadhikāni vai /
GP12brndp1_u:5565: pitryaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa vibhāvyate // BndP_1,29.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:5566: mānuṣe ṇaiva mānena varṣāṇāṃ yacchataṃ bhavet /
GP12brndp1_u:5567: pitṝṇāṃ trīṇi varṣāṇi saṃkhyātānīha tāni vai // BndP_1,29.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:5569: laukikenaiva mānena hṛbdo yo mānuṣaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:5571: divye rātryahanī varṣa pravibhāgastayoḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,29.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:5573: ye te rātryahanī divye prasaṃkhyānaṃ tayoḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,29.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:5574: triṃśadyāni tu varṣāṇi dipyo māsastu sa smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5575: yanmānuṣaṃ śataṃ viddhi divyā māsāstrayastu te // BndP_1,29.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:5576: daśa caiva tathāhāni divyo hyeṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5578: divyaḥ saṃvatsaro hyeṣa mānuṣeṇa prakīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,29.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:5581: nava yāni sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ mānuṣāṇi tu /
GP12brndp1_u:5582: anyāni navatiścaiva dhruvaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:5584: varṣāṇāṃ tu śataṃ jñeyaṃ divyo hyeṣa vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,29.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:5587: divyavarṣasahasra tu prāhuḥ saṃkhyāvido janāḥ // BndP_1,29.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:5591: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliśceti catuṣṭayam // BndP_1,29.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:5593: dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva yugānyetāni kalpayet // BndP_1,29.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:5594: catvāryāhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ ca kṛta yugam /
GP12brndp1_u:5595: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaḥ saṃdhyāyā samaḥ // BndP_1,29.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:5597: ekanyāyena vartante sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // BndP_1,29.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:5598: trīṇi dve ca sahasrāṇi tretādvāparayoḥ kramāt /
GP12brndp1_u:5599: triśatī dviśatī saṃdhye saṃdhyāṃśau cāpi tatsamau // BndP_1,29.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:5601: tasyaikaśatikā saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaḥ saṃdhyayā samaḥ // BndP_1,29.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:5603: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca kaliścaiva catuṣṭayam // BndP_1,29.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:5605: kṛtasya tāvadvakṣyāmi varṣāṇi ca nibodhata // BndP_1,29.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:5611: viṃśatiśca sahasrāmi kālaḥ sa dvāparasya ca // BndP_1,29.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:5613: ṣaṣṭiścaiva sahasrāṇi kālaḥ kaliyugasya tu // BndP_1,29.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:5614: evaṃ caturyuge kāla ṛtaiḥ saṃdhyāṃśakaiḥ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5623: viśatiśca sahasrāṇi kālo 'yaṃ sādhikaṃ vinā // BndP_1,29.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:5625: manvantarasya kālo 'yaṃ yugaiḥ sārddhaṃ ca kīrttitaḥ // BndP_1,29.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:5626: catuḥ sāhasrayuktaṃ vai prākṛtaṃ tatkṛtaṃ yugam /
GP12brndp1_u:5627: tretāśiṣṭaṃ pravakṣyāmi dvāparaṃ kalimeva ca // BndP_1,29.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:5629: kramāgataṃ mayā hyetattubhyaṃ nokta yuga dvayam // BndP_1,29.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:5631: atra tretāyugasyādau manuḥ saptarṣayaśca ye // BndP_1,29.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:5632: śrauta smārtta ca te dharma brahmaṇānupracauditam /
GP12brndp1_u:5637: satyena brahmacaryeṇa śrutena tapasā ca vai // BndP_1,29.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:5639: saptarṣīṇāṃ manoścaiva hyādye tretāyuge tathā // BndP_1,29.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:5642: ādikalpe tu devānāṃ prādurbhūtāstu yāḥ svayam /
GP12brndp1_u:5645: te mantrā vai punasteṣāṃ pratibhāyāmupasthitāḥ // BndP_1,29.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:5647: saptarṣibhistu te proktāḥ smārttaṃ dharmaṃ manurjagau // BndP_1,29.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:5651: anādinidhinā divyāḥ pūrvaṃ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā // BndP_1,29.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:5664: sarvasādhāraṇā hyete tretāyāṃ vai bhavaṃ tyuta /
GP12brndp1_u:5669: dhyātvā tu śatarūpāyāṃ putrau sa udapādayat // BndP_1,29.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:5671: tataḥ prabhṛti rājāna utpannā daṇḍadhāriṇaḥ // BndP_1,29.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:5673: pracchanna pāpāstairye ca na śakyāstu narādhipaiḥ // BndP_1,29.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:5677: yajñāḥ pravarttitāścaiva tadā hyeva tu daivataiḥ // BndP_1,29.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:5679: sārddhaṃ viśvabhujā caiva devendreṇa mahaujasā // BndP_1,29.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:5681: satyaṃ japastapo dānaṃ tretāyā dharma ucyate // BndP_1,29.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:5683: jāyante ca tadā śūrā āyuṣmanto mahābalāḥ // BndP_1,29.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:5689: nyagrodhau tu smṛtau bāhū vyāmo nyagrodha ucyate // BndP_1,29.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:5690: vyāme naivochrayo yasya sama ūrddhaṃ tu dehinaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5693: saptaitāni ca ratnāni sarveṣāṃ cakravartināma // BndP_1,29.74 //
GP12brndp1_u:5694: cakraṃ ratho maṇiḥ khaḍgaścarmaratnaṃ ca pañcamam /
GP12brndp1_u:5697: mantryaśvaḥ kalabhaścaiva prāṇinaḥ sapta kīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,29.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:5703: tretāyuge ca tānyatra jāyante cakravarttinaḥ // BndP_1,29.79 //
GP12brndp1_u:5705: atyadbhutāni catvāri balaṃ dharmaḥ sukhaṃ dhanam // BndP_1,29.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:5707: artho dharmaśca kāmaśca yaśo vijaya eva ca // BndP_1,29.81 //
GP12brndp1_u:5709: śrutena tapasā caiva munīnabhibhavanti vai // BndP_1,29.82 //
GP12brndp1_u:5720: antarikṣe samudri ca pātāle parvateṣu ca /
GP12brndp1_u:5721: ijyā dānaṃ tapaḥ satyaṃ tretāyāṃ dharma ucyate // BndP_1,29.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:5727: putrapautrasamākīrṇā mriyante ca krameṇa tu // BndP_1,29.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:5731: iti śrī brahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:5734: pūrvaṃ svāyaṃbhuve sarge yathāvattacca brūhi me // BndP_1,30.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:5736: kālākhyāyāṃ pravṛttāyāṃ prāpte tretāyuge tadā // BndP_1,30.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:5740: saṃbhārāṃstāṃstu maṃbhṛtya kathaṃ yajñaḥ pravarttitaḥ // BndP_1,30.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:5744: antarhitāyāṃ saṃdhyāyāṃ sārddhaṃ kṛtayugena tu // BndP_1,30.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:5746: auṣadhīṣu ca jātāsu pravṛtte vṛṣṭisarjane // BndP_1,30.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:5757: ālabdheṣu ca medhyeṣu tathā paśugaṇeṣu ca /
GP12brndp1_u:5760: ya indriyātmakā devāstadā te yajñabhāginaḥ // BndP_1,30.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:5762: adhvaryavaḥ praiṣakāle vyatthitā vai maharṣayaḥ // BndP_1,30.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:5764: prapacchuridraṃ saṃbhūya ko 'yaṃ yajña vidhistava // BndP_1,30.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:5766: tataḥ paśuvadhaścaiṣa tava yajñe surottama // BndP_1,30.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:5768: nāyaṃ dharmo hyadharmo 'yaṃ na hiṃsā dharma ucyate // BndP_1,30.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:5771: yajñabīcaiḥ sureśraṣṭha yeṣu hiṃsā na vidyate /
GP12brndp1_u:5777: te tu khinnā vivādena tattvamuttvā maharṣayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5778: sandhāya vākyamindreṇa papracchuḥ khecaraṃ vasum // BndP_1,30.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:5780: auttānapāde prabrūhi saṃśayaṃ no nuda prabho // BndP_1,30.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:5784: yaṣṭavyaṃ paśubhirme dhyairatha bījaiḥ phalairapi // BndP_1,30.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:5786: yatheha devatā mantrā hiṃsāliṅgā maharṣibhiḥ // BndP_1,30.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:5789: yadi pramāṇaṃ tānyeva mantravākyāni vai dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5790: tathā pravatatāṃ yajño hyanyathā vo 'nṛtaṃ vacaḥ // BndP_1,30.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:5795: vasudhā talavāsī tu tena vākyena so 'bhavat /
GP12brndp1_u:5798: bahudvārasya dharmasya sūkṣmā dūratarā gatiḥ // BndP_1,30.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:5803: tasmānna dānaṃ yajñaṃ vā praśaṃsaṃti maharṣayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5806: adrohaścāpya lobhaśca tapo bhutadayā damaḥ // BndP_1,30.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:5811: sudhāmā virajāścaiva śaṅkhaḥ pāṇḍyaja eva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:5813: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ svaistapobhirdivaṃ gatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5814: rājarṣayo mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ kīrttiḥ pratiṣṭhitā // BndP_1,30.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:5816: brahmaṇā tapasā sṛṣṭaṃ jagadviśvamidaṃ purā // BndP_1,30.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:5824: tatastamṛṣayo dṛṣṭvā hataṃ dharmabalena tu // BndP_1,30.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:5826: gateṣu munisaṃgheṣu devā yajñaṃ samāpnuvan // BndP_1,30.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:5828: tataḥ prabhṛti yajño 'yaṃ yugaiḥ saha vivarttitaḥ // BndP_1,30.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:5829: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:5831: sūta uvāca ata ūrddhaṃ pravakṣyāmi dvāparasya vidhiṃ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5832: tatra tretāyuge kṣīṇe dvāparaṃ pratipadyate // BndP_1,31.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:5833: dvāparādau prajānāṃ tu siddhistretāyuge tu yā /
GP12brndp1_u:5835: tataḥ pravarttate tāsāṃ prajānāṃ dvāpare punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5836: saṃbhedaścaiva varṇānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ ca viparyayaḥ // BndP_1,31.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:5837: yajñāvadhāraṇaṃ daṇḍo mado daṃbhaḥ kṣamā balam /
GP12brndp1_u:5839: ādye kṛte yo dharmo 'sti sa tretāyāṃ pravarttate /
GP12brndp1_u:5840: dvāpare vyākulībhūtvā praṇaśyati kalau yuge // BndP_1,31.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:5847: ayaṃ dharmo hyayaṃ neti niścayo nādhigamyate /
GP12brndp1_u:5849: matibhedena teṣāṃ vai dṛṣṭīnāṃ vibhramo bhavet /
GP12brndp1_u:5850: tato dṛṣṭivibhannaistu kṛtaṃ śāstrākulaṃ tvidam // BndP_1,31.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:5864: vyākuledvāpare nityaṃ kriyate bhinna darśanaiḥ // BndP_1,31.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:5866: dvāpare saṃpravarttate vinaśyanti tataḥ kalau // BndP_1,31.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:5874: utpadyante hi śāstrāṇāṃ dvāpare paripanthinaḥ // BndP_1,31.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:5880: manasā karmaṇā vācā kṛcchrādvārtā prasiddhyati // BndP_1,31.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:5886: vedaṃ vyāsaścaturddhā tu vyasyate dvāparādiṣu // BndP_1,31.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:5887: niḥśeṣe dvāpare tasmiṃstasya saṃdhyā tu yādṛśī /
GP12brndp1_u:5888: pratiṣṭhate guṇairhīno dharmo 'sau dvāparasya tu // BndP_1,31.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:5889: tathaiva saṃdhyā pādena hyaṅgaḥ saṃdhyā itīṣyate /
GP12brndp1_u:5893: ete svabhāvāstiṣyasya sādhayanti ca vai prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5894: eṣa dharmaḥ kṛtaḥ kṛtsno dharmaśca parihīyate // BndP_1,31.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:5895: manasā karmaṇā stutyā vārtā sidhyati vā na vā /
GP12brndp1_u:5896: kalau pramārakī rogaḥ satataṃ kṣudbhayāni ca // BndP_1,31.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:5898: na pramāṇaṃ smṛterasti tiṣye lokeṣu vai yuge // BndP_1,31.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:5900: sthavirāḥ ke 'pi kaumāre mriyante vai kalau prajāḥ // BndP_1,31.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:5902: viprāṇāṃ karmadoṣaistaiḥ prajānāṃ jāyate bhayam // BndP_1,31.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:5903: hiṃsā māyā tatherṣyā ca krodho 'sūyā kṣamā nṛṣu /
GP12brndp1_u:5904: tiṣye bhavanti jantūnāṃ rāgo lobhaśca sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,31.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:5906: pūrṇe varṣasahasre vai paramāyustadā nṛṇām // BndP_1,31.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:5907: nādhīyate tadā vedānna yajaṃ te dvijātayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5908: utsīdanti narāścaiva kṣatriyāśca viśaḥ kramāt // BndP_1,31.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:5912: guṇahīnāḥ prajāścaiva tadā vai saṃpravarttate // BndP_1,31.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:5913: āyurmedhā balaṃ rūpaṃ kulaṃ caiva praṇaśyati /
GP12brndp1_u:5916: bhṛtyā ete hyasubhṛto yugānte samavasthite // BndP_1,31.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:5920: śvāpadaprabalatvaṃ ca gavāṃ caiva hyupakṣayaḥ // BndP_1,31.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:5922: tadā dharmo mahodarke durlabho dānamūlavān // BndP_1,31.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:5924: tadā hyalpaphalā bhūmiḥ kvaciccāpi mahāphalā // BndP_1,31.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:5934: sarve vāṇijakāścā pi bhaviṣyantyadhame yuge // BndP_1,31.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:5940: na kṛte pratikarttā ca yuge kṣīṇe bhaviṣyati // BndP_1,31.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:5941: aśaṅkā caiva patite yugānte tasya lakṣaṇam /
GP12brndp1_u:5942: tataḥ śūnya vasumatī bhaviṣyati vasundharā // BndP_1,31.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:5954: abhīkṣṇaṃ kṣemamārogyaṃ sāmarthyaṃ durlabhaṃ tathā // BndP_1,31.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:5956: duḥkhenābhiplutānāṃ ca paramāyuḥ śataṃ tadā // BndP_1,31.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:5957: dṛśyante ca na dṛśyante vedā kaliyuge 'khilāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5962: utpadyante tadā te vai saṃprāpte tu kalau yuge // BndP_1,31.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:5966: apahatya tathānyonyaṃ sādhayanti tadā prajāḥ // BndP_1,31.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:5970: tasmādāyurbalaṃ rūpaṃ kaliṃ prāpya prahīyate // BndP_1,31.70 //
GP12brndp1_u:5971: tadā cālpena kālena siddhiṃ gacchanti mānavāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5972: dhanyā dharmaṃ cariṣyanti yugānte dvijasattamāḥ // BndP_1,31.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:5974: tretāyāmābdiko dharmo dvāpare māsikaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,31.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:5976: eṣā kaliyugāvasthā saṃdhyāṃśaṃ tu nibodhata // BndP_1,31.73 //
GP12brndp1_u:5980: evaṃ saṃdhyāṃśake kāle saṃprāpte tu yugāntike // BndP_1,31.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:5982: gotreṇa vai candra maso nāmnā pramatirucyate // BndP_1,31.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:5984: samāḥ saviṃśatiḥ pūrṇāḥ paryaṭanvai vasuṃdharām // BndP_1,31.77 //
GP12brndp1_u:5987: sa tadā taiḥ parivṛto mlecchānhanti smasarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5989: pāravaṇḍāstu tataḥ sarvān niḥ śeṣaṃ kṛtavānvibhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:5990: nātyartha dhārmikā ye ca tānsarvānhanti sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,31.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:6000: mādhavasya tu soṃ'śena devasyeha vijajñivān // BndP_1,31.85 //
GP12brndp1_u:6002: gotrato vai candramasaḥ pūrve kaliyuge prabhuḥ // BndP_1,31.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:6005: kṛtvā bījāvaśeṣaṃ tu pṛthvyāṃ kūreṇa karmaṇā /
GP12brndp1_u:6009: tato vyatīte kalpe tu sāmānye sahasainikaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6011: tatra saṃdhyāṃśake kāle saṃprāpte tu yugāntake /
GP12brndp1_u:6016: prajāstā vai tataḥ sarvāḥ parasparabhayārdditāḥ // BndP_1,31.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:6035: cittasaṃmohanaṃ kṛtvā tāsāṃ vai suptamattavat // BndP_1,31.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:6037: pravṛtte tu tatastasminpūte kṛtayuge tu vai // BndP_1,31.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:6039: tiṣṭhanti ceha ye siddhā adṛṣṭā vicaranti ca // BndP_1,31.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:6040: saha saptarṣibhiścaiva tatra te ca vyavasthitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6041: brahmakṣatraviśaḥ śūdrā bījārthaṃ ye smṛtā iha // BndP_1,31.105 //
GP12brndp1_u:6043: teṣāṃ saptarṣayo dharmaṃ kathayantītareṣu ca // BndP_1,31.106 //
GP12brndp1_u:6044: varṇāśramācārayuktaḥ śrautaḥ smārtto dvidhā tu saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6045: tatasteṣu kriyāvatsu vartante vai prajāḥ kṛte // BndP_1,31.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:6049: yathā dāvapradagdheṣu tṛṇeṣviha tapena tu // BndP_1,31.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:6050: vanānāṃ prathamaṃ vṛṣṭyā teṣāṃ mūleṣu saṃbhavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6051: tathā kārtayugānāṃ tu kalijaṣviha saṃbhavaḥ // BndP_1,31.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:6055: yugeṣvetāni hīyante tritripādāḥ krameṇa ca // BndP_1,31.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:6057: ityeṣa pratisaṃdhiryaḥ kīrttitastu mayā dvijāḥ // BndP_1,31.113 //
GP12brndp1_u:6062: etadeva tu sarveṣāṃ yugānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:6063: eṣā caturyugānāṃ ca guṇitā hyekasaptatiḥ // BndP_1,31.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:6065: caturyuge yathaikasminbhavatīha yathā tu yat // BndP_1,31.117 //
GP12brndp1_u:6067: sarge sarge tathā bhedā utpadyante tathaiva tu // BndP_1,31.118 //
GP12brndp1_u:6069: tathā kalpā yugaiḥ mārddhaṃ bhavanti saha lakṣaṇaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6072: tathā na saṃtiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivarttamānaḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:6073: ityeta llakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ yugānāṃ vai samāsataḥ // BndP_1,31.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:6076: khyātānīha vijānīdhvaṃ kalpaṃ kalpena caiva ha /
GP12brndp1_u:6077: anāgateṣu tadvacca tarkaḥ kāryo vijānatā // BndP_1,31.123 //
GP12brndp1_u:6080: devā hyaṣṭavidhā ye vā iha manvantareśvarāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6081: ṛṣayo manavaścaiva sarve tulyāḥ prayojanaiḥ // BndP_1,31.125 //
GP12brndp1_u:6082: evaṃ varṇāśramāṇāṃ tu pravibhāgaṃ purā yuge /
GP12brndp1_u:6083: yugasvabhāvāṃśca tathā vidhatte vai sadā prabhuḥ // BndP_1,31.126 //
GP12brndp1_u:6086: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca sthitiṃ vakṣye yugeṣviha // BndP_1,31.127 //
GP12brndp1_u:6087: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:6089: sūta uvāca yugeṣu yāstu jāyante prajāstā me nibodhata /
GP12brndp1_u:6091: yasminyuge ca saṃbhūti stāsāṃ yāvacca jīvitam /
GP12brndp1_u:6113: pañcāśatā yavānāṃ ca utsedhaḥ śākhināṃ smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6118: ityete vai parikrāntā bhāvā ye divyamānuṣāḥ // BndP_1,32.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:6119: paśūnāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ caiva sthāvarāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6120: gāvo hyajāvayo 'śvāśca hastinaḥ pakṣiṇo nagāḥ // BndP_1,32.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:6122: devasthāneṣu jāyante tadrūpā eva te punaḥ // BndP_1,32.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:6126: ataḥ śiṣṭānpravakṣyāmi sataḥ sādhūṃstathaiva ca // BndP_1,32.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:6130: na krudhyanti na tdṛṣyanti jitātmānastu te smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,32.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:6131: sāmānyeṣu tu dharmeṣu tathā vaiśeṣikeṣu ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6138: yatamāno yatiḥ sādhuḥ smṛto yogasya sādhanāt // BndP_1,32.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:6140: gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho yatistathā // BndP_1,32.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:6141: atha devā na pitaro munayo na ca mānuṣāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6142: ayaṃ dharmo hyayaṃ neti vindate bhinnadarśanāḥ // BndP_1,32.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:6146: adhāraṇāmahattve ca adharma iti cocyate // BndP_1,32.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:6152: ācinoti ca śāstrāṇi ācāryastena cocyate // BndP_1,32.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:6153: dharmajñairvihito dharmaḥ śrautaḥ smārtto dvidhā dvijaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6156: pūrvebhyo vedayitveha śrautaṃ saptarṣa yo 'bruvan // BndP_1,32.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:6160: sa eṣa vividho dharmaḥ śiṣṭācāra ihocyate // BndP_1,32.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:6161: śeṣaśabdaḥ śiṣṭa iti śeṣaṃ śiṣṭaṃ pracakṣate /
GP12brndp1_u:6162: manvantareṣu ye śiṣṭā iha tiṣṭhanti dhārmikāḥ // BndP_1,32.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:6164: dharmārthaṃ ye ca tiṣṭhanti tāñchiṣṭānvai pracakṣate // BndP_1,32.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:6166: taiḥ śiṣṭaiścarito dharmaḥ samyageva yuge yuge // BndP_1,32.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:6168: śiṣṭairācaryate yasmānmanunā ca punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,32.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:6170: dānaṃ satyaṃ tapo jñānaṃ vidyejyā vrajanaṃ dayā // BndP_1,32.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:6172: śiṣṭā yasmāccarantyenaṃ manuḥ saptarṣayastu vai // BndP_1,32.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:6176: pratyaṅgāni ca vakṣyāmi dharmasyeha tu lakṣaṇam // BndP_1,32.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:6177: dṛṣṭvā tu bhūtamarthaṃ yaḥ pṛṣṭo vai na nigū hati /
GP12brndp1_u:6180: ityetattapaso rūpaṃ sughoraṃ sudurā sadam // BndP_1,32.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:6182: ṛtvijāṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ ca saṃyogo yajña ucyate // BndP_1,32.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:6184: pravarttante samā dṛṣṭiḥ kṛtsnāpyeṣā dayā smṛtā // BndP_1,32.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:6185: ākruṣṭo nihato vāpi nākrośedyo na hanti ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6191: ātmārthaṃ vā parārthaṃ vā cendriyāṇīha yasya vai /
GP12brndp1_u:6192: mithyā na saṃpravarttante śāmasyaitattu lakṣamam // BndP_1,32.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:6194: na kruddhyeta pratihataḥ sa jitātmā vibhāvyate // BndP_1,32.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:6198: tatra naiśreyasaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ svārthasiddhaye // BndP_1,32.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:6204: saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaḥ kṛtānāmakṛtaiḥ saha // BndP_1,32.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:6208: pratyaṅgānāṃ tu dharmasya tvityetallakṣaṇaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,32.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:6210: atra vo varṇayiṣyāmi vidhiṃ manvantarasya yaḥ // BndP_1,32.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:6213: ṛco yajūṃṣi samāni yathā ca pratidaivatam /
GP12brndp1_u:6216: dravyastotraṃ guṇastotraṃ phalastotraṃ tathaiva ca // BndP_1,32.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:6218: manvantareṣu sarveṣu yathā devā bhavanti ye // BndP_1,32.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:6219: pravartayati teṣāṃ vai brahmā stotraṃ caturvidham /
GP12brndp1_u:6226: ṛṣīṇāṃ yadṛṣitvaṃ hi tadvakṣyāmīha lakṣaṇaiḥ // BndP_1,32.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:6233: pravarttate tathā dvau tu yathā matsyodake ubhe /
GP12brndp1_u:6238: saṃsidhyanti tadā vyaktāḥ krameṇa mahadādayaḥ // BndP_1,32.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:6240: bhūtabhedāśca bhūtebhyo jajñire sma parasparam // BndP_1,32.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:6256: yasmādvuddhyānuśete ca tasmādvodhātmakaḥ sa vai // BndP_1,32.84 //
GP12brndp1_u:6265: yasmāda-ṣanti te dhīrā mahāntaṃ sarvato guṇaiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6266: tasmānmaharṣayaḥ proktā buddheḥ parama darśinā // BndP_1,32.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:6268: ahaṅkāraṃ tapaścaiva ṛṣanti ṛṣitāṃ gatāḥ // BndP_1,32.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:6271: tanmātrāṇi ca satyaṃ ca ṛṣante te mahaujasaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6272: saptaṣaryasta taste ca parasatyasya darśanāḥ // BndP_1,32.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:6274: ṛṣanti te ṛtaṃ yasmādviśeṣāṃścaiva tattvataḥ // BndP_1,32.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:6278: ityetā ṛṣijātīstā nāmabhiḥ pañca vai śṛṇu // BndP_1,32.95 //
GP12brndp1_u:6280: manurdakṣo vasiṣṭaśca pulastyaśceti te daśa // BndP_1,32.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:6294: īśvarā ṛṣayaścaiva ṛṣikāścaiva te smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,32.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:6296: bhṛguḥ kāvyaḥ pracetāśca ṛcīko hyātmavānapi // BndP_1,32.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:6302: ṛtavākastathā gargaḥ śiniḥ saṃkṛtireva ca // BndP_1,32.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:6312: kāśyapaścaiva vatsāro naidhruvo raibhya eva ca // BndP_1,32.112 //
GP12brndp1_u:6316: ityete cā trayaḥ proktā mantrakārā maharṣayaḥ // BndP_1,32.114 //
GP12brndp1_u:6320: iti sapta vaśiṣṭhāśca vijñeyā brahmavādinaḥ // BndP_1,32.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:6330: bhalandanaśca vatsaśca saṃkīlaścaiva te trayaḥ // BndP_1,32.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:6332: ityeṣā navatiḥ proktā mantrā yairṛṣibhiḥ kṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6334: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:6336: sūta uvāca ṛṣikāṇāṃ sutāścāpi vijñeyā ṛṣiputrakāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6339: bahvṛco bhārgavaḥ pailaḥ sāṃkṛtyo jājalistathā // BndP_1,33.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:6347: teṣāṃ śiṣyāḥ praśiṣyāśca ṣaḍaśīti śrutarṣayaḥ // BndP_1,33.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:6349: caiminiḥ sabharadvājaḥ kāvyaḥ pauṣyañjireva ca // BndP_1,33.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:6353: ṣaṭcatvāriṃśadanye vai teṣāṃ śiṣyāḥ śrutarṣayaḥ // BndP_1,33.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:6355: lobhālobhaśca dharmātmā tathā brahma balaśca saḥ // BndP_1,33.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:6359: calūbhiḥ sumatiścaiva tathā devavaraśca yaḥ // BndP_1,33.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:6366: bhārgavo madhukaḥ piṅgaḥ śveta ketustathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6369: aditirdevamātā ca jalāpā caiva mānavī // BndP_1,33.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:6371: mudgalā cātujīvaiva tārā caiva yaśasvinī // BndP_1,33.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:6372: prātimedhī ca mārgā ca sujātā ca mahātapā /
GP12brndp1_u:6373: lopāmudrā ca dharmajñā yā ca kośītikā smṛtā // BndP_1,33.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:6375: ityetā mukhyaśaḥ proktā mayā ca ṛṣiputrakāḥ // BndP_1,33.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:6382: atyantamaparokṣaṃ ca liṅgaṃ nāma tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6383: sarvabhūtānyabhūtaṃ ca paridānaṃ ca yadbhavet // BndP_1,33.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:6393: miśrā iti samākhyātāḥ prabhāvādṛṣitāṃ gātāḥ // BndP_1,33.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:6403: yasminkālo na caṃ vayaḥ pramāṇamṛṣibhāvane // BndP_1,33.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:6412: nidhanaṃ saptamaṃ sāmnaḥ saptavindhya midaṃ smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:6413: pañcavindhya iti proktaṃ hrīṅkāraḥ praṇavādṛte // BndP_1,33.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:6425: viyogā hyabhiyogāśca kathā saṃsthā varaśca vai // BndP_1,33.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:6426: pratiṣedhopa deśau ca namaskāraḥ spṛhā tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:6429: hetu rnirvacanaṃ nindā praśastiḥ saṃśayo nidhiḥ // BndP_1,33.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:6431: upamā ca daśaite vai vidhayo brāhmaṇasya tu // BndP_1,33.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:6441: yo hyatyantaparokṣārthaḥ sa purākalpa ucyate // BndP_1,33.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:6445: yathā hīdaṃ tathā tadvai idaṃ caiva tathaiva tat // BndP_1,33.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:6449: mantrāṇāṃ kalpanā caiva vidhidṛṣṭiṣu karmasu // BndP_1,33.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:6452: astobhamanavadyaṃ ca sūtraṃ sūtravido viduḥ // BndP_1,33.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:6453: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:6456: kathaṃ vedāḥ punarvyastāstanno brūhi mahāmate // BndP_1,34.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:6457: sūta uvāca dvāpare tu purāvṛtte manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvāntare /
GP12brndp1_u:6460: saṃvṛtā yugadoṣeṇa sarve caiva yathākramam // BndP_1,34.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:6461: tasya mānaṃ yugavaśādalpaṃ caiva hi dṛśyate /
GP12brndp1_u:6463: vāya tejo balaṃ cālpaṃ sarvaṃ caiva praṇaśyati /
GP12brndp1_u:6466: yajñe naṣṭe vedanāśastataḥ sarvaṃ praṇaśyati // BndP_1,34.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:6468: punardaśaguṇaḥ kṛṣṇo yajño vai sarvakāmadhuk // BndP_1,34.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:6476: dvaipāyana iti khyāto viṣṇoraṃśaḥ sanātanaḥ // BndP_1,34.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:6477: brahmaṇā coditaḥ so 'smin vedaṃ vaktuṃ pracakrame /
GP12brndp1_u:6479: jaiminiṃ ca sumantuṃ ca vaiśaṃpāyanameva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6486: māṃ caiva pratijagrāha bhagavānīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // BndP_1,34.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:6491: tataḥ sa ṛca uddhṛtya ṛgvedaṃ samakalpayat /
GP12brndp1_u:6501: prayujyate hyaśvamedhastena vā puṣyate tu saḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6502: ṛco gṛhītvā pailastu vyabhajattu dvidhā punaḥ // BndP_1,34.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:6503: dve kṛtvā saṃhite caiva śiṣyābhyā madadādvibuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6504: indrapramattaye caikāṃ dvitīyāṃ bāṣkalāya ca // BndP_1,34.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:6511: styasravasamagryaṃ tu putraṃ sa tu mahāyaśāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6520: janakasya sa yajñe vai vināśāmagamaddvijāḥ // BndP_1,34.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:6524: etatsarvaṃ yathā vṛttamācakṣtra viditaṃ tava // BndP_1,34.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:6529: ko nveṣāṃ brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhaḥ kathaṃ me niścayo bhavet /
GP12brndp1_u:6530: iti niścitya manasā buddhiṃ cakre janādhipaḥ // BndP_1,34.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:6534: yadetadāhṛtaṃ vittaṃ yo vā śreṣṭhatamo bhavet // BndP_1,34.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:6535: tasmai tadupanītaṃ me vitta vittaṃ dvijottamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6536: janakasya vacaḥ śrutvā ṛṣayaste śrutikṣamāḥ // BndP_1,34.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:6540: mamaitanna tavetyanyo brūhi vā kiṃ vikatthase // BndP_1,34.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:6546: nayasva ca gṛhaṃvatsa mamaitannātra saṃśayaḥ // BndP_1,34.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:6548: yo vā na prīyate vidvānsamāhvayatu māciram // BndP_1,34.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:6549: tato brahmārṇavaḥ kṣubdaḥ samudra iva saṃplave /
GP12brndp1_u:6550: tānuvāca tataḥ svastho yājñavalkyo hasanniva // BndP_1,34.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:6551: krodhaṃ mā kārṣṭa vidvāṃso bhavantaḥ satyavādinaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6564: paṇastu yajamānena baddho nīto yathā dhṛtaḥ // BndP_1,34.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:6578: sāgraṃ praśnasahasraṃ tu śākalyaḥ so 'karottadā // BndP_1,34.62 //
GP12brndp1_u:6581: praśnamekaṃ mamāpi tvaṃ śākalya vada kāmikam /
GP12brndp1_u:6584: adhyātmasya gatiṃ mukhyāṃ dhyānamārgamathāpi vā // BndP_1,34.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:6590: yājñavalkyo dhanaṃ gṛhya yaśo vikhyāya cātmanaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6591: jagāma vai gṛhaṃ svacchaṃ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto vaśī // BndP_1,34.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:6592: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:6594: sūta uvāca devamitraśca śākalyo mahātmā dvijapuṅgavaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6599: niruktaṃ ca punaścakre caturthaṃ dvijasattamaḥ // BndP_1,35.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:6607: ityete bahūvṛcāḥ proktāḥ saṃhitā yaiḥ pravartitāḥ // BndP_1,35.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:6609: ṣaḍaśītistu tenoktāḥ saṃhitā yajuṣāṃ śubhāḥ // BndP_1,35.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:6613: sarveṣāmeva teṣāṃ vai tridhā bhedāḥ prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,35.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:6619: ityete carakāḥ proktāḥ saṃhitā vādino dvijāḥ // BndP_1,35.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:6620: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ carakādhvaryavaḥ kena kāraṇaṃ brūhi tattvataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6621: kiṃ cīrṇaṃ kasya vā hetoścarakatvaṃ hi bhejire // BndP_1,35.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:6623: merupṛṣṭhaṃ samāsādya taistadā tviti mantritam // BndP_1,35.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:6625: sa kuryādbrahmahatyāṃ vai samayo naḥ prakīrtitaḥ // BndP_1,35.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:6627: prayayuḥ saptarātreṇa yatra saṃdhiḥ kṛto 'bhavat // BndP_1,35.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:6631: sarve yūyaṃ samāgamya brūta kāmaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ // BndP_1,35.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:6635: uvāca yattvayādhītaṃ sarvaṃ pratyarpayasva me // BndP_1,35.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:6639: sūrye brahma yadutpannaṃ taṃ gatvā pratitiṣṭhati // BndP_1,35.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:6641: tāni tasmai dadau tuṣṭaḥ sūryo vai brahmarātaye // BndP_1,35.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:6643: yajūṃṣyadhīyate tāni brāhmaṇā yena kenacit // BndP_1,35.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:6645: brahmahatyā tu yaiścīrṇā caraṇāccarakāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,35.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:6647: ityete carakāḥ proktā vājinastu nibodhata // BndP_1,35.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:6648: yā5valkyasya śiṣyāste kaṇvo baudheya eva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6651: āvaṭī ca tathā puṇḍro vaiṇoyaḥ saparāśaraḥ // BndP_1,35.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:6652: ityete vājinaḥ proktā daśapañca ca sattamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6653: śatamekādhikaṃ jñeyaṃ yajuṣāṃ ye vikalpakāḥ // BndP_1,35.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:6661: kruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ śakrovaraṃ so 'tha punardadau // BndP_1,35.34 //
GP12brndp1_u:6663: adhīyātāṃ mahāprājñau sahasraṃ saṃhitā ubhau // BndP_1,35.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:6671: sattvāni pañca kauśilyaḥ saṃhitānā madhītavān // BndP_1,35.39 //
GP12brndp1_u:6677: trayastu kuśumeḥ śiṣyā aurasaḥ sa parāśaraḥ // BndP_1,35.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:6679: śauriṣuḥ śṛṅgiputraśca dvāvetau tu ciravratau // BndP_1,35.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:6681: provāca saṃhitāsti sraḥ śṛṅgiputrau mahātpāḥ // BndP_1,35.44 //
GP12brndp1_u:6683: provāca saṃhitāḥ ṣaṭtu pārāśaryastu kauthumaḥ // BndP_1,35.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:6686: kauthumasya tu bhedāśca pārāśaryasya paṭ samṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6689: kaṇḍuśca kohalaścaiva ṣaḍe te lāṅgalāḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,35.48 //
GP12brndp1_u:6690: ete lāṅgalinaḥ śiṣyāḥ saṃhitā yaiḥ pravarttitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6691: eko hiraṇyanābhasya kṛtaḥ śiṣyo nṛpātmajaḥ // BndP_1,35.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:6693: provāca caiva śiṣyebhyo yebhyastāśca nibodhata // BndP_1,35.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:6697: puṣṭiśca parikṛṣṭaśca ulūkhalaka eva ca // BndP_1,35.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:6701: sāmagānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭhau dvau parikīrttitau // BndP_1,35.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:6704: kabandhāya punaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ sa ca vidvānyathāśrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:6705: kabandhastu dvidhā kṛtvā pathyāyaikaṃ punardadau // BndP_1,35.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:6709: devadarśasya catvāraḥ śiṣyā hyete dṛḍhavratāḥ // BndP_1,35.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:6711: jājaliḥ kumudādiśca tṛtīyaḥ śaunakaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,35.59 //
GP12brndp1_u:6722: ete śiṣyā mama proktāḥ purāṇeṣu dhṛtavratāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6723: tribhistatra kṛtāstisraḥ saṃhitāḥ punareva hi // BndP_1,35.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:6725: māmikā tu caturthī syāccatasro mūlasaṃhitāḥ // BndP_1,35.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:6727: pāṭhāntare vṛthābhūtā vedaśākhā yathā tathā // BndP_1,35.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:6729: laumaharṣaṇikā mūlā tataḥ kāśyapikā parā // BndP_1,35.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:6732: sahasrāṇi ṛcāṃ cāṣṭau ṣaṭśatāni tathaiva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6735: aṣṭau sāmasahasrāṇi sāmāni ca caturddaśa // BndP_1,35.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:6737: dvādaśaiva sahasrāṇi cchanda ādhvaryavaṃ smṛtam // BndP_1,35.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:6738: yajuṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ ca tathā vyāso vyakalpayat /
GP12brndp1_u:6740: ataḥ paraṃ kathānaṃ tu pūrvā iti viśeṣaṇam /
GP12brndp1_u:6743: tathaiva taittirīyāṇāṃ parakṣudrā iti smṛtam // BndP_1,35.75 //
GP12brndp1_u:6745: ṛggamaḥ parisaṃkhyāto brāhmaṇaṃ tu caturguṇam // BndP_1,35.76 //
GP12brndp1_u:6746: aṣṭau sahasrāṇi śatāni vāṣṭāvaśītiranyānyadhikāni vā ca /
GP12brndp1_u:6747: etatpramāṇaṃ yajuṣāmṛcāṃ ca saśukriyaṃ sakhilaṃ yājñavalkyam //
GP12brndp1_u:6750: etāvadadhikaṃ teṣāṃ yajuḥ ki mapi vakṣyate /
GP12brndp1_u:6765: śiṣcebyaśca pradattvā tu tapastaptu vana gataḥ // BndP_1,35.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:6769: āyurvedo dhanurvedo gāndharvaśceti te trayaḥ // BndP_1,35.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:6770: arthaśāstraṃ caturthaṃ tu vidyā hyaṣṭādaśaiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:6771: jñeyā brahmarṣayaḥ pūrvaṃ tebhyo devarṣayaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,35.89 //
GP12brndp1_u:6775: yasmādṛṣanti brahmāṇaṃ tato brahmarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,35.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:6777: pratyūṣasya ca devasya kaśyapasya tathā punaḥ // BndP_1,35.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:6780: vālakhilyāḥ kratoḥ putrāḥ kardamaḥ pulahasya tu /
GP12brndp1_u:6781: kuberaścaiva paulastyaḥ pratyūṣasya dalaḥ suta // BndP_1,35.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:6784: mānave caiva ye vaṃśe ailavaṃśe ca ye nṛpāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6785: ye ca aikṣvākanābhāgā jñeyā rājarṣayastu te // BndP_1,35.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:6791: ye ca brahmarṣayaḥ proktā divyā devarṣayaśca ye // BndP_1,35.99 //
GP12brndp1_u:6793: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavajjñānaṃ satyābhi vyātdṛtaṃ tathā // BndP_1,35.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:6794: saṃtuṣṭāśca svayaṃ ye tu saṃbuddhā ye ca vai svayam /
GP12brndp1_u:6795: tapaseha prasiddhā ye garbhe yaiśca praveditam // BndP_1,35.101 //
GP12brndp1_u:6797: ete rājarṣayo yuktā devādvijanṛpāśca ye // BndP_1,35.102 //
GP12brndp1_u:6798: etānbhāvānadhigatā ye vai ta ṛṣayo matāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6799: saptaite saptabhiścaiva guṇaiḥ saptarṣayaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,35.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:6801: buddhāḥ pratyakṣa dharmāṇo gotraprāvarttakāśca te // BndP_1,35.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:6807: varṇāśramavyavasthānaṃ kriyate prathamaṃ tu vai // BndP_1,35.107 //
GP12brndp1_u:6811: jāyamāne pitāputre putraḥ pitari caiva hi // BndP_1,35.109 //
GP12brndp1_u:6814: aryamṇo dakṣiṇaṃ ye tu pitṛyānaṃ samāśritāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6815: dārāgnihotriṇaste vai yai prajāhetavaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,35.111 //
GP12brndp1_u:6818: ye śrūyante divaṃ prāptā ṛṣayo hyūrdhvaretasaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6825: saptame dvāpare vyamatāḥ svayaṃ vedāḥ svayaṃbhuvā // BndP_1,35.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:6827: tṛtīye cośanā vyāsaścaturthe ca bṛhaspatiḥ // BndP_1,35.117 //
GP12brndp1_u:6828: savitā pañcame vyāso mṛtyuḥ ṣaṣṭhe smṛtaḥ prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6829: saptame ca tathaivendro vasiṣṭhaścāṣṭame smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,35.118 //
GP12brndp1_u:6831: ekādaśe tu trivarṣā sanadvājastataḥ param // BndP_1,35.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:6833: traiyyāruṇiḥ pañcadaśe ṣoḍaśe tu dhanañjayaḥ // BndP_1,35.120 //
GP12brndp1_u:6843: bhaviṣye dvāpare caiva dvoṇirdvaipāyane 'pi ca // BndP_1,35.125 //
GP12brndp1_u:6847: tapasā karma ca prāptaṃ karmaṇā cāpi te yaśaḥ // BndP_1,35.127 //
GP12brndp1_u:6852: pramavā vasthitaṃ bhūyo bhūrbhuvaḥ svariti smṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:6853: atharvaṛgyajuḥ sāmni yattasmai brahmaṇe namaḥ // BndP_1,35.130 //
GP12brndp1_u:6855: mahataḥ paramaṃ guhyaṃ tasmai subrahmaṇe namaḥ // BndP_1,35.131 //
GP12brndp1_u:6863: kṛte punaḥ kriyā nāsti kuta evākṛtakriyāḥ // BndP_1,35.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:6864: sakṛdeva kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ yadvai loke kṛtākṛtam /
GP12brndp1_u:6865: śrotavyaṃ vā śrutaṃ vāpi tathaivāsādhu sādhu vā // BndP_1,35.136 //
GP12brndp1_u:6867: draṣṭavyaṃ vātha śrotavyaṃ ghrātavyaṃ vā kathañcana // BndP_1,35.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:6871: yadā yatkriyate yena tadā tasmo 'bhimanyate // BndP_1,35.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:6872: yatredaṃ kriyate pūrvaṃ na tadanyena bhāṣitam /
GP12brndp1_u:6873: yadā ca kriyate kiñcitkenacidvā kathaṃ kvacit // BndP_1,35.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:6874: tanaiva tatkṛtaṃ kṛtyaṃ karttṝṇāṃ pratibhāti vai /
GP12brndp1_u:6880: vyasyate hyekavedyaṃ tu dvāpareṣu punaḥ punaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6883: kurvanti saṃhitā hyete jāyamānāḥ parasparam // BndP_1,35.145 //
GP12brndp1_u:6885: atīteṣu vyatītāni varttante punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,35.146 //
GP12brndp1_u:6887: yuge yuge tu tāḥ śākhā vyasyante tai punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,35.147 //
GP12brndp1_u:6889: teṣāṃ gotreṣvimāḥ śākhā bhavanti hi punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,35.148 //
GP12brndp1_u:6890: tāḥ śākhāste ca karttāro bhavaṃ tīhāyugakṣayāt /
GP12brndp1_u:6895: pūrveṇa paścimaṃ jñeyaṃ vartamānena cobhayam // BndP_1,35.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:6897: evaṃ devāḥ sapitara ṛṣayo manavaśca vai // BndP_1,35.152 //
GP12brndp1_u:6898: mantraiḥ sahordhvaṃ gacchanti hyāvarttante ca taiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:6901: avaśyabhāvinār'thena saṃbhadhyante tadā tu te // BndP_1,35.154 //
GP12brndp1_u:6903: nivarttate tadā vṛttiḥ sā teṣāṃ doṣadarśanāt // BndP_1,35.155 //
GP12brndp1_u:6907: nidhanaṃ brahmaloke vai gatāni ṛṣibhiḥ saha // BndP_1,35.157 //
GP12brndp1_u:6908: na śakya ānupūrvyeṇa teṣāṃ vaktuṃ suvistaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6909: anāditvācca kālasya saṃkhyānāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,35.158 //
GP12brndp1_u:6911: pitṛbhirmunibhirdevaiḥ sārddhaṃ ca ṛṣibhiḥ saha // BndP_1,35.159 //
GP12brndp1_u:6915: manvantarānte saṃhāraḥ saṃhārānte ca saṃbhavaḥ // BndP_1,35.161 //
GP12brndp1_u:6917: na śakya ānupūrvyeṇa vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BndP_1,35.162 //
GP12brndp1_u:6919: manvantarasya saṃkhyā tu mānuṣeṇa nibodhata // BndP_1,35.163 //
GP12brndp1_u:6921: triṃśatkoṭyastu saṃpūrṇā saṃkhyātāḥ saṃkhyāyā dvijaiḥ // BndP_1,35.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:6923: viṃśatiśca sahasrāmi kālo 'yaṃ sādhikaṃ vinā // BndP_1,35.165 //
GP12brndp1_u:6933: sa sraṣṭā sarva bhūtānāṃ kalpādiṣu punaḥ punaḥ // BndP_1,35.170 //
GP12brndp1_u:6934: ityeṣa sthitikālo vai mato devarṣibhiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:6942: ityeṣa kīttitaḥ sargo manoḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya te /
GP12brndp1_u:6943: pratisaṃdhiṃ tu vakṣyāmi tasya caivāparasya ca // BndP_1,35.175 //
GP12brndp1_u:6948: manvantarasya kāle tu saṃpūrṇe sādhike tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:6950: maharlokāya te sarve unmukhā dadhire matim /
GP12brndp1_u:6951: tato manvantare tasminprakṣīṇe devatāstu tāḥ // BndP_1,35.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:6953: utpadyante bhaviṣyanto ye vai manvantareśvarāḥ // BndP_1,35.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:6955: manvantare tu saṃpūrṇe tadvadante kalau yuge // BndP_1,35.181 //
GP12brndp1_u:6956: saṃpadyate kṛtaṃ teṣu kaliśiṣṭeṣu vai tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:6957: yathā kṛtasya saṃtānaḥ kalipūrvaḥ smṛto budhaiḥ // BndP_1,35.182 //
GP12brndp1_u:6959: kṣīṇe manvantare pūrve pravṛtte cāpare punaḥ // BndP_1,35.183 //
GP12brndp1_u:6960: mukhe kṛtayugasyātha teṣāṃ śiṣṭāstu ye tadā /
GP12brndp1_u:6961: saptarṣayo manuścaiva kālāpekṣāstu ye sthitāḥ // BndP_1,35.184 //
GP12brndp1_u:6973: utpadyante hi pūrveṣāṃ nidhaneṣviha pūrvavat // BndP_1,35.190 //
GP12brndp1_u:6977: saptarṣayo manuścava hyādau manvantarasya hi // BndP_1,35.192 //
GP12brndp1_u:6978: prārabhante ca karmāṇi manuṣyo daivataiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:6979: ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmacaryeṇa gatvānṛṇyaṃ tu va tadā // BndP_1,35.193 //
GP12brndp1_u:6985: pūrvadevāstataste vai sthitā dharmeṇa kṛtsnaśaḥ // BndP_1,35.196 //
GP12brndp1_u:6991: śūnyeṣu devasthāneṣu trailokye teṣu sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,35.199 //
GP12brndp1_u:6992: upasthitā ihānye vai ye devāḥ svargavāsinaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:6993: tataste tapasā yuktāḥ sthānānyāpūrayanti ca // BndP_1,35.200 //
GP12brndp1_u:6995: saptarṣīṇāṃ manoścaiva devānāṃ pitṛbhiḥ saha // BndP_1,35.201 //
GP12brndp1_u:7001: atītānāgatānāṃ vai proktaṃ svāyaṃbhuvena tu // BndP_1,35.204 //
GP12brndp1_u:7005: mahājanaṃ caiva janāntapaśca caikāntagāni prabhavanti satye //
GP12brndp1_u:7006: tadbhāvināṃ tatra tu darśanena nānātvadṛṣṭena ca pratyayena /
GP12brndp1_u:7007: stye sthitā nityatayā tu nityaṃ prāpte vikāre pratisarga kāle //
GP12brndp1_u:7008: manvantarāṇāṃ parivarttanāni muñcanti satyaṃ tu tato 'parānta /
GP12brndp1_u:7011: kṣaṇaṃ na vai tiṣṭhati jīvalokaḥ kṣayodayābhyāṃ parivartamānaḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:7021: mamāpi vikhyāpayataḥ samāsātsiddhiṃ prajeśāḥ pradiśantu yuktāḥ //
GP12brndp1_u:7023: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca bhūyaḥ kiṃ varṇayāmyaham // BndP_1,35.215 //
GP12brndp1_u:7024: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:7028: sūta uvāca manvantarāṇi yāni syuratītānāgatāni ha /
GP12brndp1_u:7029: samāsā dvistarāccaiva bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,36.2 //
GP12brndp1_u:7036: manvantaraṃ mayā vo 'dhya krāntaṃ svāyaṃbhuvasya ha /
GP12brndp1_u:7037: ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi manāḥ svārociṣasya ha // BndP_1,36.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:7039: āsanvai tuṣitā devā manoḥ svārociṣe 'ntare // BndP_1,36.7 //
GP12brndp1_u:7040: pārāvatāśca vidvāṃso dvāveva tu gaṇau smṛtau /
GP12brndp1_u:7041: tuṣitāyāṃ samutpannāḥ kratoḥ putrāḥ svarociṣaḥ // BndP_1,36.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:7042: pārāvatāśca vāsiṣṭhā dvādaśa dvau gaṇau smṛtau /
GP12brndp1_u:7043: chandajāśca caturviṃśaddevāste vai tadā smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,36.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:7045: ajaśca bhagavāścaiva draviṇaśya mahā balaḥ // BndP_1,36.10 //
GP12brndp1_u:7047: cikitvānviśruto yastu cāṃśo yaścaiva paṭhyate // BndP_1,36.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:7054: hotā yajvā tathā hyete parikrāntāḥ parāvatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7058: ūrjā vasiṣṭhaputraśca staṃbaḥ kāśyapa eva ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7062: caitraḥ kiṃpuruṣa ścaiva kṛtānto vibhṛto raviḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7063: bṛhaduktho navaḥ setuḥ śrutaśceti nava smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,36.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:7065: purāṇe parisaṃkhyātā dvitīyaṃ vai tadantaram // BndP_1,36.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:7067: mūlaṃ manvantarasyaite teṣāṃ caivānvayāḥ prajāḥ // BndP_1,36.21 //
GP12brndp1_u:7069: ṛṣayo devaputrāśca iti śāstre viniścayaḥ // BndP_1,36.22 //
GP12brndp1_u:7070: manoḥ kṣatraṃ viśaścaiva saptarṣibhyo dvijā tayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7071: etanmanvantaraṃ proktaṃ samāsācca na vistarāt // BndP_1,36.23 //
GP12brndp1_u:7072: svāyaṃbhuve na vistāro jñeyaḥ svārociṣasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7073: na śakyo vistarastasya vaktuṃ varṣaśatairapi // BndP_1,36.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:7075: tṛtīye tvatha paryāye uttamasyāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,36.25 //
GP12brndp1_u:7077: sudhāmānaśca ye devā ye cānye vaśavarttinaḥ // BndP_1,36.26 //
GP12brndp1_u:7079: satyo dhṛtirdamo dāntaḥ kṣamaḥ kṣāmo dhvaniḥ śuciḥ // BndP_1,36.27 //
GP12brndp1_u:7081: ityete dvādaśa proktāḥ sudhāmānastu nāmabhiḥ // BndP_1,36.28 //
GP12brndp1_u:7083: viśvadhā viśvakarmā ca mānasastu virājasaḥ // BndP_1,36.29 //
GP12brndp1_u:7086: vittaḥ kratuḥ sudharmā ca dhṛtadharmā yaśasvijaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7091: śivā hyete tu vijñeyā yajñiyā dvādaśāparāḥ // BndP_1,36.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:7095: aśvaścaiva sadaśvaśca kṣemānandau tathaiva ca // BndP_1,36.35 //
GP12brndp1_u:7101: saptarṣayastu te sarva uttamasyāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,36.38 //
GP12brndp1_u:7107: auttamaḥ parisaṃkhyātaḥ sargaḥ svārociṣeṇa tu // BndP_1,36.41 //
GP12brndp1_u:7109: caturthe tvatha paryāye tāmasasyātare manoḥ // BndP_1,36.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:7110: satyāḥ surūpāḥ sudhiyo harayaśca gaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7115: indriyāṇi tathā devā manostasyāntare smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,36.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:7117: saptarṣayoṃ'tare ye ca tānnibodhata sattamāḥ // BndP_1,36.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:7129: caturdaśa tu catvāro gaṇāsteṣāṃ subhāsvarāḥ // BndP_1,36.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:7131: sumatirvā virāvaśca dhāmā nādaḥ śravāstathā // BndP_1,36.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:7133: amitābhāḥ smṛtā hyete devāḥ svārociṣeṃ'tare // BndP_1,36.54 //
GP12brndp1_u:7135: adhṛtirvidhṛtiścaiva damo niyama eva ca // BndP_1,36.55 //
GP12brndp1_u:7138: vṛṣo bhettā jayo bhīmaḥ śucirdānto yaśo damaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7139: nātho vidvānajeyaśca kṛśo gauro dhruvastathā // BndP_1,36.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:7141: medhā medhā tithiścaiva satyamedhāstathaiva ca // BndP_1,36.58 //
GP12brndp1_u:7145: medhajā medhahantā ca kīrttitāste sumedhasaḥ // BndP_1,36.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:7147: paulastyo davabāhuśca sudhāmā nāma kāśyapaḥ // BndP_1,36.61 //
GP12brndp1_u:7151: mahāvīryaḥ susaṃbhāvyaḥ satyako harahā śuciḥ // BndP_1,36.63 //
GP12brndp1_u:7153: raivatasya ca putrāste pañcamaṃ vai tadantaram // BndP_1,36.64 //
GP12brndp1_u:7155: priyavratānvayā hyete catvāro manavaḥ smṛtāḥ // BndP_1,36.65 //
GP12brndp1_u:7156: ṣaṣṭhe khalvapi paryāye devā ye cākṣuṣeṃ'tare /
GP12brndp1_u:7157: ādyāḥ prasūtā bhāvyaśca pṛthukāśca divaukasaḥ // BndP_1,36.66 //
GP12brndp1_u:7159: divaukasaḥ sarva eva procyante mātṛnāmabhiḥ // BndP_1,36.67 //
GP12brndp1_u:7161: gaṇastu teṣāṃ devānāmekaiko hyaṣṭakaḥ smṛtaḥ // BndP_1,36.68 //
GP12brndp1_u:7163: śrotā mantānumantā ca tvādyā hyete prakīrttitāḥ // BndP_1,36.69 //
GP12brndp1_u:7167: vijayaḥ sujayaścaiva manasyodau tathaiva ca // BndP_1,36.71 //
GP12brndp1_u:7169: bhavyā hyete smṛtā devāḥ pṛthukāṃśca nibodhata // BndP_1,36.72 //
GP12brndp1_u:7181: madhurātreya ityete sapta vai cākṣuṣeṃ'tare // BndP_1,36.78 //
GP12brndp1_u:7185: cākṣuṣasya sutāḥ hyete ṣaṣṭhaṃ caiva tadantaram // BndP_1,36.80 //
GP12brndp1_u:7188: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ cākṣuṣaḥ kasya dāyādaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ sakya vānvaye /
GP12brndp1_u:7190: sūta uvāca cākṣuṣasya visargaṃ tu samāsācchṛṇuta dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7194: dattakaḥ sa tu putro 'sya rājā hyāsītprajāpatiḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7195: svāyaṃbhuvena manunā datto 'treḥ kāraṇaṃ prati // BndP_1,36.85 //
GP12brndp1_u:7197: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tadanu vakṣyāmi upoddhātena vai dvijāḥ // BndP_1,36.86 //
GP12brndp1_u:7199: dharmasya kanyā suśroṇī sūnṛtā nāma viśrutā // BndP_1,36.87 //
GP12brndp1_u:7200: utpannā jāpi dharmema dhruvasya jananī śubhā /
GP12brndp1_u:7201: dharmasya patnyāṃ lakṣmayāṃ vai utpannā sā śucismitā // BndP_1,36.88 //
GP12brndp1_u:7202: dhruvaṃ ca kīrttimantaṃ ca tvāyuṣmantaṃ vasuṃ tathā /
GP12brndp1_u:7205: dhruvo varṣasahasrāṇi daśa divyāni vīryavān // BndP_1,36.90 //
GP12brndp1_u:7207: tretāyuge tu prathame pautraḥ svāyaṃbhuvasya tu // BndP_1,36.91 //
GP12brndp1_u:7209: tasmai brahmā dadau prīto jyotiṣāṃ sthānamuttamam // BndP_1,36.92 //
GP12brndp1_u:7211: tasyātimātrāmṛddhiṃ ca mahimānaṃ nirīkṣya tu // BndP_1,36.93 //
GP12brndp1_u:7213: aho 'sya tapaso vīryamaho śrutamaho vratam // BndP_1,36.94 //
GP12brndp1_u:7216: dhruvātsṛṣṭiṃ ca bhavyaṃ ca bhūmistau suṣuve nṛpau /
GP12brndp1_u:7217: svāṃ chāyāmāha vai sṛṣṭirbhavanārīti tāṃ prabhuḥ // BndP_1,36.96 //
GP12brndp1_u:7221: prājīnagarbhaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ vṛkañca vṛkalaṃ dhṛtim // BndP_1,36.98 //
GP12brndp1_u:7225: evaṃ manvantaraṃ yukta indratvaṃ prāptavānprabhuḥ // BndP_1,36.100 //
GP12brndp1_u:7227: ripuṃ ripuñjayājjajñe varāṅgī tu divañjayāt // BndP_1,36.101 //
GP12brndp1_u:7231: ṛṣaya ūcuḥ prajāpateḥ sutā kasmādvāruṇī procyate 'nagha /
GP12brndp1_u:7232: etadācakṣva tatvena kuśalo hyasi vistare // BndP_1,36.103 //
GP12brndp1_u:7234: tena sā vāruṇī jñeyā bhrātrā khyātimupāgatā // BndP_1,36.104 //
GP12brndp1_u:7246: janayitvā sutaṃ tasya pṛthuṃ prathitapauruṣam // BndP_1,36.110 //
GP12brndp1_u:7247: abru vaṃstveṣa vo rājā ṛṣayo muditāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7248: sa dhanvī kavacī jajñe tejasā nirdahanniva // BndP_1,36.111 //
GP12brndp1_u:7257: teṣu teṣu tu pātreṣu duhyamānā vasuṃdharā /
GP12brndp1_u:7258: prādādyathepsi taṃ kṣīraṃ tena prāṇānadhārayan // BndP_1,36.116 //
GP12brndp1_u:7259: śāṃśapāyana uvāca vistareṇa pṛthorjanma kīrttayasva mahāvrata /
GP12brndp1_u:7260: yathā mahātmanā tena pūrvaṃ dugdhā vasuṃdharā // BndP_1,36.117 //
GP12brndp1_u:7261: yathā devaiśca nāgaiśca yathā brahmarṣibhiḥ saha /
GP12brndp1_u:7263: yathā yathā ca vai sūta vidhinā yena yena ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7264: teṣāṃ pātraviśeṣāṃśca dogdhāraṃ kṣīrameva ca // BndP_1,36.119 //
GP12brndp1_u:7268: kuddhairmaharṣibhiḥ pūrvaiḥ kāraṇaṃ brūhi taddhi naḥ // BndP_1,36.121 //
GP12brndp1_u:7269: sūta uvāca kathayiṣyāmi vo viprāḥ pṛthorvainyasya saṃbhavam /
GP12brndp1_u:7276: brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya na sa śocetkṛtākṛtam // BndP_1,36.125 //
GP12brndp1_u:7280: jāto mṛtyusutāyāṃ vai sunīthāyāṃ prajāpatiḥ // BndP_1,36.127 //
GP12brndp1_u:7282: sa dharmaṃ vṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā kāmāllokeṣvartata // BndP_1,36.128 //
GP12brndp1_u:7286: na pibanti tadā somaṃ mahāyajñeṣu devatāḥ // BndP_1,36.130 //
GP12brndp1_u:7287: na yaṣṭavyaṃ na dātavyamiti tasya prajāpateḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7290: mayi yajñā vidhātavyā mayi hotavyamityapi // BndP_1,36.132 //
GP12brndp1_u:7294: tvaṃ mā kārṣīradharmaṃ vai naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // BndP_1,36.134 //
GP12brndp1_u:7296: pālayiṣye prajāśceti pūrvaṃ te samayaḥ kṛtaḥ // BndP_1,36.135 //
GP12brndp1_u:7298: venaḥ prahasya durbuddhirviditena ca kovidaḥ // BndP_1,36.136 //
GP12brndp1_u:7299: sraṣṭā dharmasya kaścānyaḥ śrotavyaṃ kasya vā mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:7300: vīryaṇa tapasā satyairmayā vā kaḥ samo bhuvi // BndP_1,36.137 //
GP12brndp1_u:7301: mandātmāno na nūnaṃ māṃ yūyaṃ jānīta tattvataḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7302: prabhavaṃ sarvalokānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // BndP_1,36.138 //
GP12brndp1_u:7304: sṛjeyaṃ vā graseyaṃ vā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // BndP_1,36.139 //
GP12brndp1_u:7306: anunetuṃ tadā venastataḥ kruddhā maharṣayaḥ // BndP_1,36.140 //
GP12brndp1_u:7307: nigṛhya taṃ ca bāhubhyāṃ visphurantaṃ mahā balam /
GP12brndp1_u:7310: hrasvo 'timātraṃ puruṣaḥ kṛṣṇaścāpi babhūva ha // BndP_1,36.142 //
GP12brndp1_u:7324: tasmiñjā te 'tha bhūtāni saṃprahṛṣṭāni sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,36.149 //
GP12brndp1_u:7328: taṃ nadyaśca samudrāśca ratnānyādāya sarvaśaḥ // BndP_1,36.151 //
GP12brndp1_u:7329: abhiṣekāya toyaṃ ca sarva evopata sthire /
GP12brndp1_u:7331: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni jaṅgamāni ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7342: etasminneva kāle tu yajatastasya vai makhe // BndP_1,36.158 //
GP12brndp1_u:7343: some sute samu tpannaḥ sūtaḥ sautye tadāhani /
GP12brndp1_u:7347: aindreṇa haviṣā cāpi haviḥ pṛktaṃ bṛhaspateḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7348: juhāvendrāya daivena tataḥ sūto vyajāyata // BndP_1,36.161 //
GP12brndp1_u:7354: madhyamo hyeṣa sūtasya dharmaḥ kṣetropajīvanam // BndP_1,36.164 //
GP12brndp1_u:7356: pṛthustavārthaṃ tau tatra samāhūtau maharṣibhiḥ // BndP_1,36.165 //
GP12brndp1_u:7358: karmaitadanurūpaṃ ca pātraṃ cāyaṃ narādhipaḥ // BndP_1,36.166 //
GP12brndp1_u:7361: na cāsya vidvo vai karma na tathā lakṣaṇaṃ yaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7362: stotraṃ yenāsya kuryāva procustejasvino dvijāḥ // BndP_1,36.168 //
GP12brndp1_u:7366: yāni karmāṇi kṛtavān pṛthuḥ paścānmahābalaḥ // BndP_1,36.170 //
GP12brndp1_u:7372: taṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāḥ prajā ūcurmaharṣayaḥ // BndP_1,36.173 //
GP12brndp1_u:7374: tato vainyaṃ mahābhāgaṃ prajāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ // BndP_1,36.174 //
GP12brndp1_u:7375: tvaṃ no vṛttiṃ vidhatsveti mahārṣivaca nāttadā /
GP12brndp1_u:7384: alabantī tu sā trāṇaṃ vainyamevānvapadyata // BndP_1,36.179 //
GP12brndp1_u:7386: uvāca vainaṃ nādharmaḥ strīvadhe paripaśyati // BndP_1,36.180 //
GP12brndp1_u:7387: kathaṃ dhārayitā cāsi prajā yā varddhitā mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:7388: mayi lokāḥ sthitā rājanmayedaṃ dhāryate jagat // BndP_1,36.181 //
GP12brndp1_u:7389: matkṛte na vinaśyeyuḥ prajāḥ pārthiva varddhitāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7390: sa māṃ narhasi vai hantuṃ śreyastvaṃ ca cikīrṣasi // BndP_1,36.182 //
GP12brndp1_u:7391: prajānāṃ pṛthivīpāla śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama /
GP12brndp1_u:7393: hatvāpi māṃ na śaktastvaṃ prajānāṃ pālane nṛpa /
GP12brndp1_u:7394: antarbhūtā bhaviṣyāmi jahi kopaṃ mahādyute // BndP_1,36.184 //
GP12brndp1_u:7396: sattvaṣu pṛthivīpāla dhama na tyaktumarhasi // BndP_1,36.185 //
GP12brndp1_u:7397: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā tasyā mahāmanāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7399: ekasyārthāya yo hanyādātmano vā parasya ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7400: ekaṃ prāṇī bahūnvāpi karma tasyāsti pātakam // BndP_1,36.187 //
GP12brndp1_u:7401: yasmiṃstu nihate bhadre jīvante bahavaḥ sukham /
GP12brndp1_u:7402: tasminhate nāsti śubhe pātakaṃ copapātakam // BndP_1,36.188 //
GP12brndp1_u:7404: yadi me vacanaṃ nādya kariṣyasi jagaddhitam // BndP_1,36.189 //
GP12brndp1_u:7406: ātmānaṃ prathayitveha prajā dhārayitā svayam // BndP_1,36.190 //
GP12brndp1_u:7407: sā tvaṃ vacanamāsthāya mama dharmabhṛtāṃ vare /
GP12brndp1_u:7408: saṃjīvaya prajā nityaṃ śaktā hyasi na saṃśayaḥ // BndP_1,36.191 //
GP12brndp1_u:7409: duhitṛtvaṃ ca me gaccha caivametamahaṃ śaram /
GP12brndp1_u:7413: vatsaṃ tu mama taṃ paśya kṣareyaṃ yena vatsalā /
GP12brndp1_u:7414: samāṃ ca kuru sarvatra māṃ tvaṃ dharmmabhṛtāṃ vara /
GP12brndp1_u:7415: yathā vispandamānaṃ me kṣīraṃ sarvatra bhāvayet // BndP_1,36.194 //
GP12brndp1_u:7416: sūta uvāca tata utsārayāmāsa śilājālani sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7417: dhanuṣkoṭyā tathā vainyastena śailā vivarddhitāḥ // BndP_1,36.195 //
GP12brndp1_u:7419: svabhāvenā bhavattasyāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca // BndP_1,36.196 //
GP12brndp1_u:7420: na hi pūrvanisarge vai viṣame pṛthivītale /
GP12brndp1_u:7421: pravibhāgaḥ purāṇāṃ vā grāmāṇāṃ vāpi vidyate // BndP_1,36.197 //
GP12brndp1_u:7422: na sasyāni na gorakṣaṃ na kṛṣirna vaṇikpathaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7425: samatvaṃ yatra yatrāsīdbhūmeḥ kasmiṃścideva hi // BndP_1,36.199 //
GP12brndp1_u:7426: tatra tatra prajāstā vai nivasaṃti ca sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7427: āhāraḥ phala mūle tu prajānāmabhavatkila // BndP_1,36.200 //
GP12brndp1_u:7430: sa kalpayitvā vatsaṃ tu cākṣuṣaṃ manumīśvaraḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7431: pṛthurdudoha sasyāni sve tale pṛthivīṃ tataḥ // BndP_1,36.202 //
GP12brndp1_u:7432: tenānnena tatastā vai varttayanti śubhāḥ prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7433: ṛṣibhiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasuṃdharā // BndP_1,36.203 //
GP12brndp1_u:7436: kṣīramāsīttadā teṣāṃ tapo brahma ca śāśvatam /
GP12brndp1_u:7439: vatsastu maghavānāsīddogdhā ca savitā vibhuḥ // BndP_1,36.206 //
GP12brndp1_u:7440: kṣīramūrjaṃ ca madhu ca varttante tena devatāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7441: pitṛbhiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasundharā // BndP_1,36.207 //
GP12brndp1_u:7445: asuraiḥ śrūyate cāpi punardugdhā vasundharā // BndP_1,36.209 //
GP12brndp1_u:7449: pāyasā te ca māyābhiḥ sarve māyāvino 'surāḥ // BndP_1,36.211 //
GP12brndp1_u:7451: nāgaistu śrūyate dugdhā vatsaṃ kṛtvā tu takṣakam // BndP_1,36.212 //
GP12brndp1_u:7453: teṣāṃ vai vāsukirdegdhā kādraveyaḥ pratāpavān // BndP_1,36.213 //
GP12brndp1_u:7454: nāgānāṃ vai dvijaśreṣṭha sarpāṇāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7459: dogdhā rajatanābhastu pitā maṇidharasya yaḥ // BndP_1,36.216 //
GP12brndp1_u:7461: tena te varttayantīti paramarthatayā ca ha // BndP_1,36.217 //
GP12brndp1_u:7463: brahmā brāhyāstu vai dogadhā teṣāmāsītkuberakaḥ // BndP_1,36.218 //
GP12brndp1_u:7465: kapālapātre nirdugdhā hyantarddhanaṃ ca rākṣasaiḥ // BndP_1,36.219 //
GP12brndp1_u:7469: teṣāṃ vasurucistvāsīddogdhā putro muneḥ śubhaḥ // BndP_1,36.221 //
GP12brndp1_u:7471: śailaiśca śrūyate dugdhā punardevī vasundharā // BndP_1,36.222 //
GP12brndp1_u:7477: kāmadhuk puṣpitaḥ śālaḥ plakṣo vatso yaśasvinām // BndP_1,36.225 //
GP12brndp1_u:7479: saiva dhātrī vidhātrī ca dhāraṇī ca vasundharā // BndP_1,36.226 //
GP12brndp1_u:7480: dugdhā hitārthaṃ lokānāṃ pṛthuneti hi naḥ śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:7481: carācarasya lokasya pratiṣṭhā yonireva ca // BndP_1,36.227 //
GP12brndp1_u:7482: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅga pāde śeṣamanvantarāśyānaṃ pṛthivīdohanaṃ ca nāma ṣaṭtriṃśattamo 'dhyāyaḥ
GP12brndp1_u:7483: sūta uvāca āsīdiha samudrāntā vasudheti yathā śrutam /
GP12brndp1_u:7484: vasu dhatte yatastasmādvasudhā seti gīyate // BndP_1,37.1 //
GP12brndp1_u:7498: yodhairapi ca saṃgrāme prāptukāmairjayaṃ yudhi // BndP_1,37.8 //
GP12brndp1_u:7500: yo hi yoddhā raṇaṃ yāti kīrttayitvā pṛthuṃ nṛpam // BndP_1,37.9 //
GP12brndp1_u:7504: ete vatsaviśeṣāśca dogdhāraḥ kṣīrameva ca // BndP_1,37.11 //
GP12brndp1_u:7506: brahmaṇā prathamaṃ dugdhā purā pṛthvī mahātmanā // BndP_1,37.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:7507: vāyuṃ kṛtvā tathā vatsaṃ bījāni vasudhātale /
GP12brndp1_u:7508: tataḥ svāyaṃbhuve pūrvaṃ tadā manvantare punaḥ // BndP_1,37.13 //
GP12brndp1_u:7509: vatsaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ kṛtvā sarvasasyāni caiva hi /
GP12brndp1_u:7510: tataḥ svārociṣe vāpi prāpte manvantare 'dhunā // BndP_1,37.14 //
GP12brndp1_u:7511: vatsaṃ svārociṣaṃ kṛtvā dugdhā sasyāni medinī /
GP12brndp1_u:7512: uttamena tu tenāpi dugdhā devānu jena tu // BndP_1,37.15 //
GP12brndp1_u:7514: punaśca pañcame pṛthvī tāmasasyāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,37.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:7515: dugdheyaṃ tāmasaṃ vatsaṃ kṛtvā vai balabandhunā /
GP12brndp1_u:7516: cāriṣṭavasya vai ṣaṣṭhe saṃprāpte cāntare manoḥ // BndP_1,37.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:7517: dugdhā mahī purāṇena vatsaṃ cāriṣṭavaṃ prati /
GP12brndp1_u:7518: cākṣuṣe cāpi saṃprāpte tadā manvantare punaḥ // BndP_1,37.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:7519: dugdhā mahī purāṇena vatsaṃ kṛtvā tu cākṣuṣam /
GP12brndp1_u:7521: vainyeneyaṃ purā dugdhā yathā te kathitaṃ mayā /
GP12brndp1_u:7522: etairdugdhā purā pṛthvī vyatīteṣvantareṣu vai // BndP_1,37.20 //
GP12brndp1_u:7525: devā manvantare svasthāḥ pṛthostu śṛṇuta prajāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7533: samudratanayāyāṃ tu kṛtadāraḥ sa vai prabhuḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7544: tadupaśrutya tapasā sarve yuktāḥ pracetasaḥ // BndP_1,37.31 //
GP12brndp1_u:7554: bhaviṣyajjanatā hyeṣā dhṛtā garbheṇa vai mayā // BndP_1,37.36 //
GP12brndp1_u:7556: bhāryā bhavatu vo hyeṣā somagarbhā vivarddhitā // BndP_1,37.37 //
GP12brndp1_u:7562: saṃtdṛtya kopaṃ vṛkṣebhyaḥ patnīṃ dharmeṇa māriṣām // BndP_1,37.40 //
GP12brndp1_u:7566: asṛjanmanasā tvādau prajā dakṣo 'tha maithunāt // BndP_1,37.42 //
GP12brndp1_u:7568: visṛjya manasā dakṣaḥ paścādasṛjata striyaḥ // BndP_1,37.43 //
GP12brndp1_u:7569: dadau sa daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayāṃ daśa /
GP12brndp1_u:7572: dve caiva bahuputrāya dve caivāṅgirase tathā // BndP_1,37.45 //
GP12brndp1_u:7574: antaraṃ cākṣuṣasyātha manoḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu gīyate // BndP_1,37.46 //
GP12brndp1_u:7576: vasudevāḥ khagā gāvo nāgā ditijadānavāḥ // BndP_1,37.47 //
GP12brndp1_u:7580: ṛṣiruvāca devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca devarṣiṇāṃ ca te śubhaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7581: saṃbhavaḥ kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // BndP_1,37.49 //
GP12brndp1_u:7583: kathaṃ prāce tastvaṃ ca punarlebhe mahātapāḥ // BndP_1,37.50 //
GP12brndp1_u:7584: etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ sūta vyākhyātuṃ tvamihārhasi /
GP12brndp1_u:7585: dauhitraścaiva somasya kathaṃ śrvaśuratāṃ gataḥ // BndP_1,37.51 //
GP12brndp1_u:7586: sūta uvāca utpattiśca nirodhaśca nityaṃ bhūteṣu sattamāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7587: ṛṣayo 'tra na suhyanti vidyāvantaśca ye janāḥ // BndP_1,37.52 //
GP12brndp1_u:7588: yuge yuge bhavantyete sarve dakṣādayo dvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7589: punaścaiva nirudhyante vidvāṃstatra na muhyati // BndP_1,37.53 //
GP12brndp1_u:7592: imāṃ visṛṣṭiṃ yo veda cākṣuṣasya carācaram /
GP12brndp1_u:7595: ityete ṣaṭ nisargāśca krāntā manvantarātmakāḥ // BndP_1,37.56 //
GP12brndp1_u:7597: ete sargā yathā prājñaiḥ proktā ye dvijasattamāḥ // BndP_1,37.57 //
GP12brndp1_u:7603: samāsavyāsataḥ sargaṃ bruvato me nibodhata // BndP_1,37.60 //
GP12brndp1_u:7604: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
GP12brndp1_u:7606: sūta uvāca saptama tvatha paryāye manorvaivasvatasya ha /
GP12brndp1_u:7608: ādityā vasavī rudrāḥ sādhyā viśve marudgaṇāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7611: sādhyāśya vasavo viśve dharmaputrāstrayo gaṇāḥ // BndP_1,38.3 //
GP12brndp1_u:7613: vaivasvateṃ'tare hyasminnitye te chandajā matāḥ // BndP_1,38.4 //
GP12brndp1_u:7615: evaṃ sargastu mārīco vijñeyaḥ sāṃprataḥ śubhaḥ // BndP_1,38.5 //
GP12brndp1_u:7617: atītānāgatā ye ca varttante sāṃprataṃ ca ye // BndP_1,38.6 //
GP12brndp1_u:7622: trailokye yāni sattvāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca /
GP12brndp1_u:7629: bhavyaṃ smṛtaṃ divaṃ hyetatteṣāṃ vakṣyāmi sādhanam // BndP_1,38.12 //
GP12brndp1_u:7637: bhavanāttu bhuvalloko niruttayā hi nirucyate // BndP_1,38.16 //
GP12brndp1_u:7639: utpanne tu tathā loke dvitīye brahmaṇā punaḥ // BndP_1,38.17 //
GP12brndp1_u:7641: anāgate bhavya ita śabda eṣa vibhāvyate // BndP_1,38.18 //
GP12brndp1_u:7643: bhūritīyaṃ smṛtā bhūmirantarikṣaṃ bhuvaḥ smṛtam // BndP_1,38.19 //
GP12brndp1_u:7644: divaṃ smṛtaṃ tathā bhavyaṃ tralokyasyaiṣa nirṇayaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7646: nātha ityeṣa dhāturvai dhātujñaiḥ pālane smṛtaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7650: manvantareṣu ye devā yajñabhājo bhavanti hi /
GP12brndp1_u:7652: mahimānaḥ smṛtā hyete devendrāṇāṃ tu sarvaśaḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7653: devendrā guravo nāthā rājānaḥ pitaro hi te // BndP_1,38.24 //
GP12brndp1_u:7665: ikṣvākuśca nṛgaścaiva dhṛṣṭaḥ śaryātireba ca // BndP_1,38.30 //
GP12brndp1_u:7669: kīrtitā vai tathā hyete saptamaṃ caitadantaram // BndP_1,38.32 //
GP12brndp1_u:7670: ityeṣa ha mayā pādo dvitīyaḥ kathitodvijāḥ /
GP12brndp1_u:7671: vistareṇānupūrvyā ca bhūyaḥ kiṃ kathayāmyaham // BndP_1,38.33 //
GP12brndp1_u:7672: iti śrībrahmāṇḍe mahāpurāṇe vāyuprokte pūrvabhāge dvitīye 'nuṣaṅgapāde
